Luis, 29, lives with his mother and children in a rented house. Luis has made and sold sweet bread for a living for 7 years and thanks to his charisma and experience he has earned the trust of many customers who like him more every day. 

Luis wants to invest in his bakery, for which he is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in buying the necessary ingredients (bread flour, sugar, colourants, eggs, butter, etc.) for the bakery, which is his main source of income.

loans.use: to buy bread flour, sugar, colourants, eggs, butter, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy corn in bulk.

loans.name: Dinora Del Carmen

texts.es: Dinora de 51 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y sus hijos. Dinora se dedica a la venta de prendas de vestir y cosméticos. La venta la realiza de manera ambulante en las principales zonas de su localidad y tiene mucho tiempo de dedicarse a dicho negocio por lo que cuanta con muchos clientes que cada día la prefieren más. Desea invertir en su negocio por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para hacer la compra de prendas de vestir, cremas, lociones, maquillaje, etc. Espera poder contar con este financiamiento y así hacer el desembolso lo antes posible con el fin de mejorar sus ingresos y su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Dinora, 51, lives in her own house along with her husband and their children. Dinora makes her living selling clothing and cosmetics. She carries out the sales on the street in the main zones of her area. She has a lot of time to spend on said business, so every day she has more customers who prefer her more.

She wishes to invest in her business, which is why she is applying for this FUSAI loan to buy clothing, creams, perfumes, makeup, etc. She hopes she can depend on this funding and therefore make the expenditure as soon as possible with the goal of improving her income and quality of life.

loans.use: to buy: clothing, creams, perfumes, makeup, etc.

loans.name: Delmy Noemy

texts.es: Delmy de 21 años de edad es madre soltera y habita junto a su padre y su pequeña hija de 3 años de edad. Delmy se dedica a la elaboración y venta de Pupusas desde hace siete años. De esta forma se gana la vida y con mucho esfuerzo va sacando a adelante a su pequeña hija. Desea invertir es su negocio de pupusas ya que desea cubrir una mayor demanda por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de los insumos necesarios (maíz, queso, frijoles, repollo, tomates, etc.) para la elaboración de las deliciosas pupusas que tanto demandan sus clientes.
texts.en:
Delmy is a 21-year old single mother who lives with her father and 3-year old daughter. Delmy has made a living making and selling "pupusas" (stuffed tortillas) for 7 years. With hard work, she is able to get ahead and support her young daughter. 

She would like to invest in her "pupusas" business to cover the higher demand, which is why she is requesting this loan to FUSAI. She plans to buy the necessary ingredients (corn, cheese, beans, cabbage, tomatoes, etc.) to make the delicious "pupusas" that are so popular among her clients.

loans.use: to buy corn, cheese, beans, cabbage, tomatoes, etc.

loans.name: Dimas Eladio

texts.es: Dimas de 58 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañera de vida y su hijo, desde hace 10 años el se dedica a la crianza y venta de ganado de engorde, adicional a eso también cultiva maíz y frijol, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar,Dimas esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de concentrado y vitaminas para seguir con la crianza de su ganado así poder obtener una mejor ganancia por sus ventas y darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Dimas is 58 years old, and lives in his own house with his life partner and his son.  He has been raising and selling beef cattle for ten years.  In addition to this, he grows corn and beans, and with what he makes from his sales, he is able to pay some of his household expenses.
  
Dimas is seeking a loan for the purchase of feed and vitamins, in order to continue raising his cattle. This way, he will be able to obtain better earnings  from his sales, and give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase vitamins and feed for his cattle.

loans.name: Eliazar

texts.es: Don Eliazar de 62 años de edad se dedica a la crianza y venta de ganado desde hace varios años, ya tiene clientela establecida que lo prefieren por la calidad y los buenos precios, es hombre dedicado a su trabaja y a su familia siempre esta en busca de darles lo mejor sin limitaciones algunas, Don Eliazar esta solicitando un credito para la compra de dos vacas y poder mejorar el terreno donde las piensa tener que es el que muestra la fotografía para seguir con su trabajo ya que esa es su unica fuente de ingresos y asi poderle dar a su familia que esta conformada por su esposa y sus hijos lo que necesitan sin limitacion alguna.
texts.en:
Don Eliazar, 62, has worked raising and selling livestock for several years, he already has an established customer base that choose him for the high quality and good prices. He is dedicated to his work and his family and is always looking to give them the best, without any restrictions. 

Done Eliazar is asking for a loan to buy two cows and to be able to improve his land, which can be seen in the photograph, in order to continue with his work, which is his only source of income, and so he can give his family, which is made up of his wife and children, whatever they need without restrictions.

loans.use: to buy two cows and to be able to improve the land.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy bricks, sand, cement, gravel, and iron to build a retention wall.

loans.name: Silvia Yaneth

texts.es: Silvia de 32 años de edad, es madre soltera vive junto a su hijo de 10 años de edad en casa de un familiar, Ella se dedica a la venta de antojitos los días sábados y domingos desde hace 8 años, es una persona trabajadora, honrada y muy responsable, su negocio tiene mucha demanda gracias a la calidad con la que elabora sus productos además por la amabilidad con la que atiende a sus clientes, gracias a su trabajo ha logrado solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Silvia solicita un crédito para comprar mesa, bancas y un toldo para el negocio, y poder ofrecerle a sus clientes un establecimiento más agradable, así mejorar su nivel de ventas, obtener mayores ingresos y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Silvia is 32 years old and is a single mother who lives with her ten year old son in a relative's home. For eight years she has made a living selling snacks on Saturdays and Sundays. Silvia is a hard working, honorable and very responsible person. Her business is in high demand thanks to the quality products that she makes and the friendliness with which she serves her customers. 

Thanks to her work, she has been able to cover some of the household expenses. Silvia is requesting a loan to buy a table, benches and an awning for her business to offer her customers a nicer establishment. This will allow her to improve her sales, obtain greater earnings and improve her standard of living.

loans.use: to buy a table, benches and an awning for her business.

loans.name: María Antonia

texts.es: Maria de 62 años de edad habita en casa propia junto con su esposo, ella se dedica a la agricultura con la ayuda de su esposo, desde hace varios años, cosecha los principales granos básicos como son: maíz y frijol, cuando su cosecha ya esta lista la comercializa en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su lugar de residencia, Ella es una mujer muy emprendedora y admirable ya que a pesar de su edad sigue trabajando y no se cansa de realizar esta actividad ya que para ella, lo más importante en la vida es ganarse el pan de cada día dignamente con el trabajo de sus manos y el sudor de su frente, Doña Maria esta solicitando un préstamo a INTEGRAL para invertir en la comprar de los insumos agrícolas como: semillas, insecticidas, abonos, fertilizantes, etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografía para comenzar la siembra lo más antes posible. Confía plenamente que obtendrá una cosecha abundante la cual le permitirá mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su esposo.
texts.en:
Maria is 62 years old and lives in her own house with her husband. She has dedicated herself to agriculture, with the help of her husband, for various years. She harvests basic grains such as corn and beans. When her harvest is ready, she sells it in the different markets around her place of residence. 

Maria is an enterprising and admirable woman who, despite her age, continues working and never rests until her activities are completed. For her, the most important thing in life is to earn her daily bread honorably, working with her own hands and the sweat of her brow.

Maria is requesting a loan through INTEGRAL to invest in purchasing agricultural inputs such as seeds, insecticides, manure, fertilizers, etc., and to improve the land that can be seen in our photograph, and to commence sowing as soon as possible. She has full confidence that she can obtain an abundant harvest, which will permit her to improve the quality of life for herself and her husband.

loans.use: to buy seeds, insecticides, manure, fertilizers, etc., and to improve the land.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: la clienta de 26 años de edad vive con su compañero de vida y sus dos hijos. Ella posee una venta de ropa tiene de diferentes estilos y  para todas las personas damas, caballeros, niños y niñas, la ropa que comercia es de muy buena calidad y la vende a precios accesibles es por eso que se ha hecho de mucha clientela últimamente; la clienta es muy activa siempre se encuentra trabajando, luchando por salir adelante. Para ella el propósito y coraje que le pone a su labor tiene una dirección ver crecer el negocio para lograr un mejor futuro, es por eso que se decidió solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar ropa en variedad como faldas, pantalones, blusas, camisetas, trajes etc. Así siempre podrá satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes, tiene la esperanza que de esta forma lograra darle a su familia seguridad económica y una vida plena.
texts.en:
The client, age 26, lives with her life partner and their two children.  She has a business of selling different styles of clothing for all people; women, men, boys, and girls.  The clothes that she sells are very good quality.  She sells at affordable prices, and that is why she has gotten a lot of customers lately.

The client is very active; she can always be found working and struggling to get ahead.  To her, the determination and tenacity that she puts into her work has a purpose.  That is to see her business grow in order to obtain a better future.

That is why she decided to request a loan from Integral.  The loan will allow her to buy various items of clothing like skirts, pants, blouses, t-shirts, and suits, etc.  This way she will always be able to satisfy her customers’ needs.  She hopes that this way she will manage to give her family financial security and a full life.

loans.use: to buy various items of clothing like skirts, pants, blouses, t-shirts, and suits, etc.

loans.name: Alexander De Los Angeles

texts.es: Alexander de 36 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposa y sus dos hijos de 11 años y 5 meses de edad. Alexander trabaja como albañil y electricista, dichos oficios le permiten llevar el sustento a su hogar y mantener la economía de la familia. Alexander  desea construir una fosa séptica  para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillos, cemento, arena, grava, inodoro y lámina galvanizada ya que no cuenta con el capital disponible para hacer el desembolso pero si con la capacidad de cancelar las cuotas mensuales que el crédito implica.
texts.en:
Alexander, age 36, lives in his own house with his wife and their two children, ages 11 and 5 months.  Alexander works as a bricklayer and electrician.  These occupations allow him to support his household and maintain his family’s finances.

Alexander wishes to build a septic tank.  In order to do so, he is requesting this loan from FUSAI.  He will use the loan to buy bricks, cement, sand, gravel, a toilet, and galvanized metal sheeting.  He does not have the capital available for this expenditure.  However, he does have the ability to make the monthly payments on the loan.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, sand, gravel, a toilet, and galvanized metal sheeting in order to build a septic tank.

loans.name: Pedro Antonio

texts.es: Don Pedro de 41 años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus dos hijos en casa propia, el se dedica a la venta de ropa tiene varios años con el negocio y eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, el negocio esta ubicado en su lugar de residencia, se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues las personas saben que todo es de calidad, a precios accesibles. Don Pedro quiere realizar una nueva inversión, pero no posee de suficiente capital que la respalde por eso solicita un crédito que le permita comprar blusas, faldas, camisetas, pantalones y todo los necesario para su negocio, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez tiene la esperanza que llevara a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
Pedro, age 41, lives with his life partner and their two children in his own house.  He sells clothes, and he has had his business for several years.  This has gifted him with a lot of experience, which allows him to get the best earnings.  The business is located at his house.  He has gotten a lot of customers.  People know that everything is quality at affordable prices.

Pedro wants to make a new investment.  However he does not have enough capital to do so.  That is why he is requesting a loan that will allow him to buy blouses, skirts, t-shirts, pants, and everything needed for his business.  He is certain that he will be able to repay the debt.  He hopes to bring financial security to his household.

loans.use: to buy blouses, skirts, t-shirts, pants, etc.

loans.name: Juan Edgar

texts.es: Juan de 38 años de edad vive en casa propia junto a su esposa y sus tres hijos de 17, 13 y 9 años de edad ellos estudian actualmente, el se dedica al cultivo de arroz, tiene 5 años de trabajar en la agricultura y eso le  ha regalado mucha experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores cosechas, sus cosechas las comercia en los alrededores de la comunidad, ya tiene mucha clientela que lo prefieren por la calidad, los buenos precios y sobre todo por el buen servicio; el necesita invertir por eso le solicita un credito que le permita comprar semillas, insecticida, herbicida, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografía. Juan tiene buenas referencias de pago por parte de sus conocidos, y es muy responsable, asegura que podrá cancelar la deuda en el periodo establecido y a la vez confía que llevara a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
Juan, age 38, lives in his own house with his wife and their three children, ages 17, 13, and 9.  The children currently go to school.  Juan grows rice.  He has been working in agriculture for five years.  This has gifted him with a lot of experience, which allows him to get the best harvests.  He sells his harvests in the areas surrounding his community.  He already has a lot of customers who prefer him for the quality; good prices; and most of all, for the good service.

He needs to invest, and that is why he is requesting a loan.  The loan will allow him to buy seeds, insecticides, herbicides, fertilizers, compost, and pesticides, etc.  It will allow him to improve the land shown in the photograph.  Juan has good payment references from the people that know him, and he is very responsible.  He is certain he will be able to repay the loan according to the established time frame.  He is confident that he will bring financial security to his household.

loans.use: to buy seeds, insecticides, herbicides, fertilizers, compost, and pesticides, etc. and to improve the land.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy galvanized sheet metal, nails, and wood to construct the hallway of her home.

loans.name: Elida Consuelo

texts.es: Elida de 36 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus cinco de hijos y su esposo. Ella posee una tortillería en el lugar de su residencia, desde hace 3 años, se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues tiene un excelente servicio, es muy amable con las personas que la visitan, además tiene gran agilidad para la elaboración de las mismas y atiende a los clientes en poco tiempo. Elida es muy dedicada en su trabajo, le solicita a ITNEGRAL  un crédito que le permita comprar maíz por mayor y cal para seguir produciendo. ella tiene la esperanza que de esta forma le dará a su familia una seguridad económica en el hogar.
texts.en: Elida is 36 years old and lives in her own home with her five children and her husband. She has owned a tortilla shop in her home for 3 years. She has gained many customers as she has excellent customer services, is very friendly with people that visit her, and in addition she has great talent for making tortillas and serving her customers quickly. Elida is very dedicated to her work, and is asking ITNEGRAL for a loan that will permit her to buy lime and corn at wholesale in order to continue making tortillas. She hopes that in this way she will give her family secure economic support for their home.

loans.use: to buy lime and corn at wholesale.

loans.name: Patricia Del Carmen

texts.es: Patricia de 39 años de edad es madre soltera y habita en casa propia junto a su hija de 18 años de edad. Patricia se dedica a la elaboración  de manteles y colchas en telares que ha logrado adecuar en su casa de habitación. Desea mejorar sus condiciones de vida  y las de su familia por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la reparación del techo de la vivienda y para pavimentar el piso de la misma. Con el monto solicitado comprará lámina galvanizada, madera, cemento, arena y grava.
texts.en: Patricia is 39 years old and a single mother. She lives in her own home along with her daughter, who is 18 years old. Patricia works making tablecloths and bedspreads on looms that she has adapted for use in her home. She would like to improve her and her family’s living conditions, which is why she is requesting this loan from FUSAI to repair the roof and pave the floor of her house. With the amount requested, she will buy galvanized sheets, wood, cement, sand and gravel.

loans.use: to buy galvanized sheets, wood, cement, sand and gravel to repair the roof and pave the floor of her house.

loans.name: Santos Everilda

texts.es: Santos de 33 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y su pequeño hijo de 4 años de edad. Santos se dedica a la prestación de servicios domésticos desde hace mucho tiempo lo cual le permite llevar el sustento a su hogar y colaborar con la economía de la familia. Con mucho esfuerzo junto a su compañero  de vida  han logrado construir su vivienda la cual aun le hace falta el corredor por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de polines, lámina galvanizada y pines para construir lo antes posible el corredor de la vivienda que tanta falta le hace.
texts.en:
Santos, age 33, lives in her own house with her life partner and her little four year old son.  Santos has been providing domestic services for quite some time.  This allows her to provide sustenance to her household and to help with the family finances.

With great effort, she and her life partner have managed to build their house.  It still needs the hallway.  That is why she is requesting this loan from FUSAI.  She will use the loan to buy poles, galvanized metal sheeting, and bolts in order to build, as soon as possible, the hallway that her house needs so much.

loans.use: to buy poles, galvanized metal sheeting, and bolts to build the hallway in her house.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: el cliente de 21 años de edad es muy amable y trabajador, vive con sus padres y sus hermanos, El trabaja muy duro en su propia parcela donde siembra arroz; sus productos son de muy buena calidad, cuando su cosecha ya esta lista sale a comercializarla a los diferentes mercados que estan cerca de su lugar de residencia. el cliente solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL para contar con el dinero necesario e invertir en la compra de insumos agrícolas como controles de plaga, fertilizantes, abonos, semillas entre otras cosas que necesita para su siembra y mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografía, él ansía aumentar sus ventas para poder percibir mayores ganancias y darle a su familia una mejor estabilidad economica.
texts.en:
The client, age 21, is very kind and hard-working.  He lives with his parents and his siblings.  He works very hard on his own piece of land where he grows rice.  His products are very good quality.  When his harvest is ready, he goes out to sell it at the different markets that are close to where he lives.

The client is requesting a loan from Integral to buy pesticides, fertilizers, compost, and seeds, among other things that he needs for his crops and to improve the land seen in the photograph.  He longs to increase his sales in order to be able to get greater income and to give his family better financial stability.

loans.use: to buy pesticides, fertilizers, compost, and seeds, among other things that he needs for his crops and to improve the land.

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es: Carmen de 64 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su hijo y sus nietos desde hace mucho tiempo. Carmen se dedica a la prestación de servicios domésticos desde hace mucho tiempo. Para ella lo más importante es su familia y hace todo lo que este a su alcance para dar mejores condiciones de vida. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la construcción de un cuarto el cual no ha logrado terminar por falta de recursos económicos. Ademas, desea construir un muro de retención en su terreno. Con el monto solicitado comprará lámina galvanizada, madera, cemento, ladrillo, arena y hierro.
texts.en: Carmen is 64 years old and has lived in her own home with her son and grandchildren for some time now. She has worked for a long time providing domestic services. Her family is most important to her, and she does everything she can to improve their living conditions. She is requesting this loan from FUSAI to build a room that she has been unable to finish because of a lack of economic resources. In addition, she would like to build a retaining wall on her plot of land. With the requested amount, she will buy galvanized sheets, wood, cement, brick, sand and iron.

loans.use: to buy galvanized sheets, wood, cement, brick, sand and iron to build a room and a retaining wall.

loans.name: Armando

texts.es: Armando vive en casa propia con sus dos hijos mayores de edad y quienes le ayudan en el trabajo de la siembra, él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol, tiene muchos años de trabajar en la agricultura y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia valiosa que le da la oportunidad de obtener siempre las mejores cosechas, el terreno de cultivo esta ubicado en una zona de alta incidencia agrícola y esta cercano a su vivienda, comercia en todas las zonas aledañas y tiene mucha clientela pues las personas saben que todo lo que comercia es de primera calidad y a precios accesibles; el es un hombre emprendedor, muy dedicado a su labor, Armando solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semillas, herbicida, insecticida, abonos, etc.  Armando tiene buenas referencias y es muy responsable en sus pagos por eso asegura poder cancelar la deuda y a la vez llevar a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
Armando lives in his own home with his two adult children who help him with his agricultural work. He has grown corn and beans for many years, from which he has gained a lot of valuable experience that gives him the opportunity to always obtain the best harvests. The land he cultivates is located in a rich agricultural area near his home. He sells his products in all the neighboring areas, and he has many customers because people know that everything he sells is of the highest quality and is available at affordable prices. He is an enterprising man and is very dedicated to his work.

Armando is requesting a loan from Apoyo Integral to buy seeds, herbicide, insecticide, fertilizers, etc. Armando has good references and is very responsible with his payments. He is sure he will be able to pay back the loan, while at the same time bringing greater economic security to his home.

loans.use: to buy seeds, herbicide, insecticide, fertilizers, etc.

loans.name: Herminia

texts.es: Herminia de 59 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su nieto  quien ya es mayo de edad. Herminia se dedica a la crianza y venta  de pollo de engorde desde hace 10 años. Herminia desea construir un muro de retención a la orilla de la calle para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento, ladrillo, arena, grava y hierro. Además, si le alcanza desea encementar parte del piso del corredor de la vivienda.
texts.en:
Herminia, age 59, lives in her own house with her adult grandson.  Herminia has been raising and selling broiler chicken for ten years.

Herminia wishes to build a retaining wall at the edge of the street.  In order to do so, she is requesting this loan from FUSAI.  She will use the loan to buy cement, bricks, sand, gravel, and iron.  Also, if there is enough she wishes to enlarge part of the floor of the hallway in her house.

loans.use: to buy cement, bricks, sand, gravel, and iron and to enlarge part of the hallway floor in her house.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El cliente de 28 años de edad se dedica a la agricultura desde hace varios años, su principal siembra es el frijol, maíz y yuca, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos de los gastos que tiene en su hogar, es un hombre responsable, honesto y trabajador vive con su familia en casa propia, el cliente está solicitando un credito para comprar herbicidas, abonos, semillas, fertilizantes, etc. y poder mejorar el terreno donde desea hacer su siembra que es el que muestra en la fotografía ya que con lo que gana no le alcanza para poder realizarlo ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo y asi poder tener mejores cosechas y para darle a su familia una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
The borrower is 28 years old and has worked in agriculture for a number of years. His principal crops are beans, corn and cassava. He uses the income from his sales to pay for some of his household expenses. He is a responsible, honest and hardworking man who lives with his family in their own home.

The borrower is requesting a loan to buy herbicides, manure, seeds and fertilizers to improve a plot of land he would like to cultivate, which is the land shown in the photograph. He does not earn enough to do this without the loan, and this work is his only source of income. He hopes to obtain better harvests so he can give his family better economic stability.

loans.use: to buy herbicides, manure, seeds and fertilizers to improve a plot of land he would like to cultivate.

loans.name: Ernesto

texts.es: Ernesto de 61 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y su hijo, el se dedica a la agricultura desde hace varios años su principal siembra es el güisquil y el maiz, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Don Ernesto esta solicitando un credito para la compra de herbicidas, controles de plagas, fertilizantes, abonos, semillas, etc. y asi poder seguir con sus siembras para obtener mejores ganancias y darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Ernesto is 61 years old and lives in his own home with his wife and their son. He has been farming for several years and his main crops are squash and corn. With what he had gets from his sales, he manages to pay some of his household expenses.

Ernesto is requesting a loan in order to buy herbicides, pest-control agents, fertilizers, manures, seeds, etc. This is so that he can continue with his farming, in order to obtain better earnings and give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy herbicides, pest-control agents, fertilizers, manure, seeds, etc.

loans.name: Tatiana Michelina

texts.es: Tatiana de 31 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a sus cuatro hijos de 13 años, 8 años, 6 años y 6 meses de edad. Tatiana es una mujer emprendedora quien hace todo lo que este a su alcance para dar a sus hijos mejores condiciones de vida. Ella se dedica  a la elaboración y venta de tortillas dentro de su hogar de habitación. De esta forma mantiene la economía del hogar y da a sus hijos lo necesario. Tatiana  desea reparar el techo de la vivienda ya que con el tiempo se ha deteriorado y no es muy seguro. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a  FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada y madera.
texts.en:
Tatiana is 31 years old and lives in a home of her own with her four children, ages 13, 8, 6, and 6 months.  Tatiana is an entrepreneur who does everything within her reach to provide better living conditions for her children.  She makes and sells tortillas in her home and in this way meets the household finances and provides for her children.

Tatiana wants to make repairs to her roof because it has been deteriorated for some time and it’s not very safe.  She is asking for a loan through FUSAI to buy galvanized metal and lumber.

loans.use: to repair her roof.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: la clienta de 24 años de edad es madre soltera vive en casa de un familiar con sus dos hijos, ella  posee una tienda donde vende artículos de primera necesidad, frijoles, café, azúcar, arroz, leche, huevos, golosinas,pan, entre otros, tiene muchos años con su negocio y eso le ha regalado experiencia en las ventas que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, esta ubicada en el lugar de su residencia en una localidad muy transitada, es muy reconocida por los vecinos de la zona , se ha hecho de mucha clientela, pues tiene la tienda surtida, ella quiere acrecentar el negocio y realizar una nueva inversión pero necesita de capital por eso solicita un crédito que le permita comprar lo necesario para su tienda, asegura que cancelara la deuda y a la vez confía en que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: She is 24 years old and a single mother who lives with relatives and her two children.  She has a store where she sells necessities such as beans, coffee, sugar, rice, milk, eggs, snacks, bread, and other things.  She’s had this business for many years and has lots of experience in sales, allowing her to obtain high earnings.  It’s located in her home, which is in a very travelled area, well known by the local residents.  She has earned many customers because she keeps her store well stocked.  She wants to grow her business and will use the money from this loan to buy what she needs for her store.  She is certain that she will pay the debt and is also sure that she will be able to provide a better quality of life for her family.

loans.use: to stock her store.

loans.name: Domingo

texts.es: Domingo de 32 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su compañera de vida, mamá y dos hijos. Domingo trabaja como albañil de forma ambulante desde hace mucho tiempo. Domingo no cuenta con energía eléctrica y desea hacer la respectiva instalación por lo que solicita este crédito a  FUSAI para invertir en la instalación del servicio de energía eléctrica que tanta falta le hace a él y a su familia.
texts.en: Domingo is 32 years old and lives in a home of his own with his wife, mother, and two children.  Domingo works as a mobile mason and has done so for a long time.  Domingo doesn’t have electricity and wants to install it and is asking for this loan through FUSAI so he can install the service that he and his family badly need.

loans.use: to instal electicity in his home.

loans.name: Ana Esperanza

texts.es: Ana de 50 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su hija y sus dos pequeños nietos. Ana posee una pequeña tienda en la cual vende variedad de productos de primera necesidad como: aceite, azúcar, sal, frijoles, golosinas, pan dulce, etc. Ana desea mejorar sus ingresos por lo que ha tomado la decisión de invertir en la compra de pan dulce que normalmente es lo que más se vende. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de variedad de pan dulce para la venta y así poder mejorar sus ventas y ganancias con el fin de mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Ana is 50 years old and lives in her own home with her daughter and her two small grandchildren. Ana owns a small store where she sells a variety of basic household necessities such as: cooking oil, sugar, salt, beans, candy, sweet breads, etc.

Ana wishes to improve her income, so she has made the decision to invest in the purchase of sweet breads, which normally is what she sells the most of. 

She is requesting this loan from FUSAI in order to invest in the purchase of a variety of sweet breads to sell, and so be able to improve her sales and earnings, with the aim of improving her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: To buy a variety of sweet breads to sell.

loans.name: Marta Lidia

texts.es: marta de 41 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus dos hijos, ella se dedica a la venta de yuca salcochada y frita, su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia desde hace varios años posee su negocio que le ha generado buenas ganancias y con eso ha podido sacar adelante a su familia, Marta esta solicitando un credito para poder comprar los ingredientes necesarios como: yuca, tomates, aceite, repollo, etc. y asi obtener mejores ganancias para darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Marta is 41 years old. She lives in her own home with her husband and their two children. She sells boiled and fried yucca. She has her business in her residence and has had her business for several years. It has generated good earnings and with them she has been able to get her family ahead. Marta is asking for a loan to be able to buy ingredients she needs, such as yucca, tomatoes, oil, cabbage, etc. This way, she will obtain better earnings to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy yucca, tomatoes, oil, cabbage, etc.

loans.name: Dina Yaneth

texts.es: Dina de 38 años de edad es madre soltera vive en casa propia con sus tres hijos y su madre, ella tiene un negocio de compra y venta de chatarra como: hierro, latas, bronce, aluminio, etc. su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logar solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Dina esta solicitando un credito para la compra de mas chatarra por mayor, para poder seguir con su negocio que le genera buenas ganancias y asi poderle dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Dina is 38 years old, a single mother, and lives in her own home with her three children and her mother. She has a business buying and selling metal for recycling such as: iron, tins, bronze, aluminum, etc. Her business is located in her home, and with what she gets from her sales, she manages to pay some of her household expenses. 

Dina is requesting a loan in order to purchase more metal for recycling at wholesale, so that she can continue with her business, which generates good earnings. This way she will be able to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy metal for recycling: such as iron, tins, bronze, aluminum, etc. at wholesale.

loans.name: Evis Noel

texts.es: Evis de 35 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su hija de un año de edad y su hijo de cinco meses de edad. Evis posee una  pequeña tienda que con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado establecer. De esta forma se gana la vida y mantiene la economía de su hogar. Evis desea invertir en la compra de productos de de primera necesidad para la tienda ya que este negocio es su principal fuente de ingresos. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de: aceite, arroz, frijoles, golosinas, detergente, etc. Espera poder contar con este apoyo  y así mejorar sus ventas e ingresos.
texts.en: Evis, 35, lives in his own home with his one-year-old daughter and five-month-old son. Evis has a small shop, which he was able to establish with a lot of effort. This allows him to earn a living and financially support his household. Evis wants to invest in buying basic necessity products for his shop because this business is his primary source of income. This is why he is requesting this loan from FUSAI to invest in buying cooking oil, rice, beans, drinks, detergent, and other products. He hopes to count on this support in order to improve his sales and income.

loans.use: to buy cooking oil, rice, beans, drinks, detergent, and other products.

loans.name: Carlota Marlene

texts.es: Carlota de 30 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su hija de 11 años y su hijo de 6 años de edad. Carlota se dedica a la venta de ropa nueva de forma ambulante en las principales zonas de su localidad. Tiene tres años de experiencia de contar con el negocio por lo que ya posee muchos clientes que cada día la prefieren más. Carlota desea invertir en la compra de variedad de ropa para dama y niños para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de prendas de vestir como: faldas, blusas, pantalones, ropa para niños y ropa interior.
texts.en:
Carlota is 30 years old, and lives in her own home with her 11-year-old daughter and 6-year-old son. Carlos sells new clothing as a street vendor in the main areas of her town. She has three years experience with her business, so she has many customers who each day prefer her more. 

Carlota wishes to invest in the purchase of a variety of women's and children's clothing. For this purpose she is requesting this loan from FUSAI, in order to invest in the purchase of articles of clothing such as: skirts, blouses, pants, children's clothing and underwear.

loans.use: To buy: skirts, blouses, pants, children's clothing and underwear.

loans.name: Maydee Patricia

texts.es: Maydee de  43 años de edad  habita en casa propia junto a sus hijos y nietos. Maydee se dedica  a la venta de pupusas y panes con pollo desde hace 20 años. Este negocio es su principal fuente de ingresos y es así como lleva el sustento  a su hogar. Desea invertir en su negocio por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en los insumos necesarios (maíz, frijoles, queso, pan francés, pollo y verduras) para la elaboración de panes con pollo y pupusas.
texts.en: Maydee, 43, lives in her own home with her children and grandchildren. Maydee makes a living by selling pupusas and bread with chicken, which she has been doing for 20 years. This business is her primary source of income and it is how she supports her household. She wants to invest in her business, which is why she is requesting this loan from FUSAI to invest in products she needs such as corn, beans, cheese, French bread, chicken, and vegetables. With these items, she will make pupusas and bread with chicken.

loans.use: to buy corn, beans, cheese, French bread, chicken, and vegetables.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy perfumes, nail polish, deodorants, creams, lotions, etc.

loans.name: Jose David

texts.es: jose de 51 años de edad vive en casa propia con su familia, el se dedica desde hace varios años al cultivo de arbolitos de cafe, ya tiene clientela establecida que lo prefieren por los buenos precios, con lo que obtiene de su ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Jose esta solicitando un credito par al compra de abonos, herbicidas, controles de plagas, etc. para poder seguir con sus cultivos ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo y asi poder obtener mejores ganancias y darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Jose is 51 years old. He lives in his own home with his family. He has worked for several years growing small coffee plants. He already has regular customers who prefer him because of his good prices. With what he obtains from his sales, he is able to cover some of the household expenses. Jose is asking for a loan to buy fertilizer, herbicide, pest control, etc., in order to be able to continue with his crops. This is his only source of work and this way he will be able to obtain better profits and give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, herbicide, pest control, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy beans, milk, eggs, bread, sweets and beverages for her store.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: el cliente de 22 años de edad vive en casa propia con su familia, es un hombre responsable, honesto y muy trabajador desde hace 3 años se dedica a la crianza de pollos de engorde, comercializa los pollos en los mercados que se encuentran cerca de su lugar de residencia ya tiene clientela establecida que lo prefieren por los buenos precios, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas ayuda en los gastos e su hogar, el cliente esta solicitando un credito para la compra de 100 pollos mas y concentrado para alimentarlos y asi seguir con su crianza ya que esa es su unica fuente de trabajo para poder seguir ayudando a su familia en los gastos que se les presentan en su hogar.
texts.en:
This borrower is 22 years old and lives with his family in a house of their own. He is a responsible, honest and hardworking man. He has been raising broilers for three years. He sells them at the marketplace, close to where he lives and has loyal customers that prefer his good prices. He helps to cover the home expenses with the profits he makes.

He is requesting a loan to buy 100 broilers and animal feed. This way he will be able to continue with his business, which is his only source of income. He will continue helping his family to cover the expenses.

loans.use: to buy 100 broilers and animal feed.

loans.name: Angela

texts.es: Angela de 41 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar conformado por su esposo y sus tres hijos, ella se dedica desde hace 23 años a la venta de mariscos, lo hace de forma ambulante por la diferentes colonias que se encuentran cerca de su lugar ya tiene clientela establecida que la prefieren por que su producto es fresco y a buen precio, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo y con la ayuda de su esposo logran salir adelante con los gastos que se les presentan en su hogar, Angela esta solicitando un credito para la compra de mariscos por mayor para poder seguir con su trabajo y darle a su familia todo lo que necesitan sin limitaciones algunas.
texts.en: Angela, 41, lives with her family in her own home.  Her family consists of her husband and her 3 children.  Angela has been selling seafood for 23 years.  She sells from place to place in the various neighborhoods near her home.  She already has regular customers who prefer her business because of her fresh products and good prices.  With the income she obtains from her work and the help of her husband, they manage to cover the household expenses.  Angela is requesting a loan to buy seafood at wholesale so that she can continue to work and give her family everything they need without any limitations.

loans.use: to buy seafood at wholesale

loans.name: Neftali De Jesus

texts.es: Neftali de 45 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a sus tres hijos de 23 años, 18 años y 16 años de edad. Él se dedica a la elaboración de estructuras metálicas, puertas y ventanas. Desea invertir en  su negocio ya que desea mejorar sus ingresos por lo que ha tomado la decisión de invertir en la compra de materiales como: hierro, electrodos, pintura anticorrosiva y herramientas para la elaboración de las estructuras metálicas.
texts.en: Neftali, 45, lives in his own home with his three children ages 23, 18, and 16. He earns a living by making metal structures, doors, and windows. He wants to invest in his business so he can improve his income. This is why he made the decision to invest in buying materials such as iron, electrodes, antirust paint, and tools to make metal structures.

loans.use: to buy iron, electrodes, antirust paint, and tools to make metal structures to sell.

loans.name: Ana Gloria

texts.es: Ana de 41 años de edad vive en casa propia con su hijo y dos nietos, ella es muy responsable y quien tiene como prioridad principal sacar adelante a sus familia. Ella posee una venta de tortillas, en la cual se encarga de elaborar cada mediodía y cada noche. Su negocio esta ubicado en su casa de habitación. Ana desea mucho poder mejorar su negocio, ya que este brinda ganancias muy estables, lo cual le permite sostener a su familia, es por esto que solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda comprar maíz por mayor y cal, esto para elaborar mayor cantidad de tortillas, sobretodo los fines de semana que su demanda se incrementa debido a que muchas otras tortillerías están cerradas y asi ella pueda obtener mayores ganancias las cuales le permitan mejorar su estabilidad economica.
texts.en: Ana, 41, lives in her own house with her child and 2 grandchildren.  She is very responsible, and her first priority is to provide for her family.  Ana has a business selling tortillas.  She is in charge of making the tortillas every noon and night.  Her business is located in her house.  Ana really wants to improve her business, because it is providing very stable earnings which enable her to support her family.  She is requesting a loan to buy corn at wholesale and also lime (calcium hydroxide) so that she can make a greater quantity of tortillas, particularly during the weekends when the demand increases, because during this time many of the other tortilla businesses are closed.  This way she can obtain greater earnings, giving her better financial stability.

loans.use: to buy corn at wholesale and to buy lime

loans.name: Ana Gladys

texts.es: Ana de 44 años de edad vive con su esposo y sus dos hijos en casa propia. Ella posee una tortillería en su residencia, ya tiene 2 años con el negocio y se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues tiene un excelente servicio, es muy amable con las personas que la visitan siempre tiene una sonrisa en el rostro para ellos, además tiene gran agilidad para la elaboración de las mismas y atiende a los clientes en poco tiempo. Ana es muy dedicada en su trabajo, es por eso que le solicita a ITNEGRAL  un crédito que le permita comprar maíz por mayor para seguir produciendo. Ella tiene la esperanza que de esta forma le dará a su familia una seguridad económica en el hogar.
texts.en: Ana, 44, lives with her husband and 2 children in her own house.  She has a tortilla business in her home.  She already has 2 years of experience with this business, and she has attracted a lot of customers because she provides excellent service.  She is very kind to the people who visit her business; she always has a smile on her face for them.  In addition, she is able to make the tortillas and tend to her customers very quickly.  Ana is very dedicated to her work.  This is why she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL to buy corn at wholesale so that she can continue to produce.  Ana hopes that in this way, she will be able to provide her family with greater financial security.

loans.use: to buy corn at wholesale

loans.name: Noe

texts.es: noe de 36 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa, el posee una tienda en su lugar de residencia tiene muchos años con su negocio y eso le ha regalado experiencia en las ventas que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias,es muy reconocido por los vecinos de la zona , se ha hecho de mucha clientela, pues tiene la tienda surtida, el quiere acrecentar el negocio y realizar una nueva inversión pero necesita de capital por eso solicita un crédito que le permita comprar lo necesario para su tienda como golosinas, granos basicos, aceite, arroz, azucar, refrescos, etc. asegura que cancelara la deuda y a la vez confía en que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Noe, 36, lives in his own home with his wife. He has a store in his home and he has had this business for many years. This has provided him with sales experience, which has allowed him to earn more income. He is well-known by his neighbors in the area and he has gained many customers because his business is stocked up. Noe wants to grow his business and make a new investment but he needs capital so he is requesting a loan so he can buy the necessary items for his store such as sweets, basic grains, cooking oil, rice, sugar, drinks, and other products. He assures lenders that he will pay off his debt, and he also mentions that this will give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy sweets, basic grains, cooking oil, rice, sugar, drinks, and other products.

loans.name: Norma Gloria

texts.es: norma de 41 años de edad se dedica desde hace 2 años a la venta de pollo su negocio lo tiene ubicado en el mercado que se encuentra cerca de su lugar de residencia, con las ganancias que obtiene logra cubrir algunos gastos de su hogar, vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus tres hijos, Norma esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de pollos por mayor para poder seguir con su negocio y darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Norma is 41 years old and has been selling chicken for two years. She works at a marketplace located close to where she lives, and with the profits she makes she can cover some of the home expenses. She lives with her husband and three children in a house of their own.

Norma is requesting a loan to buy chickens wholesale in order to continue with her business and give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy chickens wholesale.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: el cliente de 28 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y su hijo, el se dedica a la venta de electrodomésticos lo hace de forma ambulante por las diferentes colonias que se encuentran cera de su lugar de residencia, con las ganancias que obtiene logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, El cliente esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de ventiladores por mayor ya que últimamente se los han solicitado y asi poder atender mejor a sus clientes y obtener mejores ganancias para darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida
texts.en:
This borrower is 28 years old and lives with his wife and son in a house of their own. He works as a street vendor, selling electrical appliances in different neighborhoods close to where he lives. He manages to cover some of the home expenses with the profits he makes.

He is requesting a loan to buy electric fans in large quantities, since his customers have been asking for them lately. He will be able to give them a better service, make more profits and improve his family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy electric fans in large quantities.

loans.name: Aida Milagro

texts.es: Aida de 39 años de edad vive con su compañero de vida y su hijo. Ella posee una tortillería la cual es muy conocida en la localidad donde reside, tiene muchos clientes pues vende las mejores tortillas, calientitas y con el servicio más rápido además a precios realmente accesibles; Aida es una mujer emprendedora con ganas de salir adelante, tiene una actitud de ganadora, por eso siempre se mantiene adelante de la competencia, ella piensa que cuando alguien desea algo debe saber que corre riesgos y por eso la vida vale la pena, quiere correr el riesgo para poder hacer crecer su negocio por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz por mayor. Aida tiene la esperanza que de esta forma podrá llevar a su hogar seguridad económica y una vida plena para su familia.
texts.en:
Aida, 39, lives with her life partner and her son.  She has a tortilla business that is well-known in the area where she lives.  She has a lot of customers, as she sells the best, piping-hot, tortillas with rapid service and at a truly affordable price.  Aida is an enterprising woman who has a strong desire to get ahead.  She has the attitude of a winner, and because of this she is always ahead of the competition.  She thinks that when someone wants something she must be aware that there are risks involved but life is worth it. She is willing to take a risk to try and expand her business. That is why she is asking  Integral for a loan which will allow her to buy corn in bulk. 

Aida hopes that this way she will be able to bring financial stability to her household so that her family can have a full life.

loans.use: to buy corn at wholesale

loans.name: Agustina De Jesus

texts.es: Agustina de 35 años de edad tiene una pequeña tienda en la que vende productos perecederos como refrescos, golosinas, dulce y otras serie de artículos comestibles y no comestibles; a través de  este comercio ha sacado adelante a su familia. vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus dos hijos, ella busca mejorar su calidad  de  vida,  por lo que solicita un crédito para incrementar la variedad de sus  artículos en su tienda, como: granos básicos, refrescos, golosinas, etc.  lo que le permitiría incrementar las ganancias de  su negocio y mejorar las condiciones de vida de su grupo familiar.
texts.en:
Agustina, 35, has a small store where she sells perishables such as soft drinks, candy, sweets, and other types of food and non-food items.  She has gotten her family ahead with this business.  She lives in her own house with her husband and her two children.

Agustina's looking for ways to improve her quality of life, so she's requesting a loan to increase the variety of goods in her store, such as basic grains, soft drinks, sweets, etc.  This will allow her to increase her business profits and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, soft drinks, candy, etc.

loans.name: Wilfredo

texts.es: Wilfredo de 48 años de edad vive en casa propia con su familia, el posee una tienda en su lugar de residencia tiene muchos años con su negocio y eso le ha regalado experiencia en las ventas que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias,es muy reconocido por los vecinos de la zona, se ha hecho de mucha clientela, pues tiene la tienda surtida, el quiere acrecentar el negocio y realizar una nueva inversión pero necesita de capital por eso solicita un crédito que le permita comprar lo necesario para su tienda como golosinas, granos basicos, aceite, arroz, azucar, refrescos, etc. asegura que cancelara la deuda y a la vez confía en que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida
texts.en:
Wilfredo, 48, lives in his own house with his family.  He has a store in his home.  He has had his business for many years and it has given him sales experience, which allows him to earn the best profits.  He's very well known among the neighbors in the area and has acquired a lot of customers because he keeps his store stocked.

Wilfredo wants to expand the business and make a new investment.  He needs capital, however, so he's requesting a loan to buy what he needs for his store, including basic grains, oil, rice, sugar, and soft drinks.

He's certain he'll pay back the debt and also trusts he'll give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy candy, basic grains, oil, rice, sugar, soft drinks, etc.

loans.name: Sandra Del Carmen

texts.es: Sandra vive con su compañero de vida y sus cuatro hijos, Ella se dedica a la venta de tortillas en su casa desde hace varios años trabaja de lunes a domingo, tiene mucha clientela pues es una persona muy trabajadora y amable, con las ganancias que obtiene y la ayuda de su esposo logran solventar los gastos de su hogar. Sandra esta solicitando un credito para comprar maiz por quintales para seguir elaborando las tortillas y asi obtener mejores ganancias para tener una mejor estabilidad economica junto con su familia.
texts.en:
Sandra lives with her life companion and her four children.  She has made a living selling tortillas in her house for several years; she works from Monday through Sunday.

Sandra has a lot of customers because she's a very hardworking and friendly person.  With her profits and her husband's help she manages to pay the household expenses.

Sandra's requesting a loan to buy corn by the quintal to continue making tortillas so she can have better profits and greater economic stability with her family.

loans.use: to buy corn by the quintal

loans.name: Maria Julia

texts.es: Maria vive en casa propia con su compañero de vida y su hijo, ella posee un negocio de venta de choco bananos (bananos cubiertos de chocolate), gelatinas y flan, desde hace varios años ubicado en su lugar de residencia, posee mucha clientela ya que es un producto muy vendible, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar algunos gastos de su casa, Maria esta solicitando un credito para poder comprar todos los ingredientes necesarios como: frutas, leche, cajas de gelatina, cajas de flan, bananos, chocolate, etc. para poder seguir con su negocio que le genera buenas ganancias y asi poderle dar a su familia lo que necesitan sin limitaciones algunas.
texts.en:
Maria lives in the home she owns with her life partner and their son. She has a business selling chocolate-covered bananas, gelatin, and custard. It is located in her home and has been running for several years. She has lots of customers because it is a product that sells easily. What she earns from her work allows her to cover some of her household expenses.

Maria is requesting a loan in order to be able to buy all the ingredients she needs, such as fruit, milk, boxes of gelatin, boxes of custard, bananas, chocolate, etc. This will allow her to keep her business going so that it continues generating good income for her and she can give her family what they need without any limitations.

loans.use: to buy fruit, milk, boxes of gelatin, boxes of custard, bananas, chocolate, etc.

loans.name: Elena

texts.es: Elena de 39 años de edad vive con su compañero de vida y su hijo la cual asiste a una escuela cercana de la localidad. Ella posee una venta de ropa tiene de diferentes estilos y  para todas las personas damas, caballeros, niños y niñas, la ropa que comercia es de muy buena calidad y la vende a precios accesibles es por eso que se ha hecho de mucha clientela últimamente; Elena es muy activa siempre se encuentra trabajando luchando por salir adelante. Para ella el propósito y coraje que le pone a su labor tiene una dirección ver crecer el negocio para lograr un mejor futuro, es por eso que se decidió solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar ropa en variedad como faldas, pantalones, blusas, camisetas, trajes etc. Así siempre podrá satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes. Elena tiene la esperanza que de esta forma lograra darle a su familia seguridad económica y una vida plena.
texts.en:
Elena, who is 39 years old, lives with her life partner and their child, who goes to a nearby local school. She works selling different styles of clothing for men, women, boys, and girls. The clothing items she sells are very high quality and her prices are affordable, which is why she has reached a large customer base lately. Elena is very active and she is working hard and fighting to get ahead.

For her, the goal of the courage and purpose that she puts into her her work is to see her business grow in order to achieve a better future. That is why she has decided to request a loan from Integral, so that she can purchase a variety of clothing items like skirts, pants, blouses, suits, t-shirts, etc. This will allow her to always be able to meet her customers' needs. Elena is hopeful that this will be a way for her to give her family financial security and a full life.

loans.use: to buy a variety of clothing items like skirts, pants, blouses, suits, t-shirts, etc.

loans.name: Hilda Noemi

texts.es: Doña hilda 42 años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus tres hijos en casa propia, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa tiene varios años con el negocio y eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, el negocio esta ubicado en su lugar de residencia, se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues las personas saben que todo es de calidad, a precios accesibles y con un servicio inigualable siempre a la orden y al gusto de los clientes; Hilda es una mujer emprendedora, dedicada a su labor, en las ultimas semanas aumento la demanda y quiere aprovechar para una nueva inversión, pero no posee de suficiente capital que la respalde por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar ropa por mayor, ella tiene buenas referencias de pago y una moral intachable, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez tiene la esperanza que llevara a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
Hilda is 42 years old and lives with her life partner and their three children in her own home. She works selling clothing. She has been in business for several years and from that she has gained a lot of experience, which allows her to obtain the best profit. Her business is located in her home and she has reached a large customer base because people know that everything is top quality, that prices are affordable, and that her service is without par: she is always at her customers' disposal and able to meet their preferences. 

Hilda is an enterprising woman, dedicated to her work. Demand has increased over the past few weeks and she wants to take that opportunity to make a new investment, but she doesn't have enough capital behind her, which is why she is requesting a loan from Integral. This loan will allow her to purchase wholesale clothing items. She has good credit references and impeccable moral standards. She is positive that she will be able to pay off the debt and at the same time she is hopeful that she will bring financial security to her household.

loans.use: to buy wholesale clothing items.

loans.name: Lilian Lissette

texts.es: Lilian de 31 años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y su hijo en casa propia, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa tiene varios años con el negocio y eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, el negocio esta ubicado en su lugar de residencia, se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues las personas saben que todo es de calidad y a precios accesibles.  Lilian quiere realizar una nueva inversión, pero no posee de suficiente capital que la respalde por eso solicita un crédito que le permita comprar blusas, faldas, camisetas, pantalones y todo los necesario para su negocio, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez tiene la esperanza que llevara a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
Lilian is 31 years old and lives with her life partner and her son in her own house. She makes a living selling clothing and has had this business for several years. This has given her a lot of experience which allows her to make the best profits. Her business is based in her home and she has built up a large clientele because people know everything is good quality and the prices are affordable.

Lilian wants to make a new investment but does not have enough capital behind her. This is why she is asking for a loan which will help her to buy blouses, skirts, t-shirts, trousers and everything else she needs for her business. She gives an assurance that she will be able to pay off the loan and at the same time she hopes it will bring her household financial security.

loans.use: to buy blouses, skirts, t-shirts, trousers etc.

loans.name: Marco Antonio

texts.es: Marcos de 41 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus tres hijos, desde hace 20 años se dedica a la elaboración de dulces típicos que comercializa por las diferentes colonias que se encuentran cerca de su casa, posee mucha clientela por ser un producto de calidad y a buenos precios, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Marcos esta solicitando un credito para la compra de los ingrediente necesarios como: azucar, colorantes, sabores comestibles, etc. para poder seguir con la elaboración ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo y asi obtener mejores ganancias para darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Marcos is 41 years old and lives in his own house with his wife and their three children. For 20 years he has made a living making typical sweets which he sells in the various communities in the area near his home. He has a lot of customers since his product is of a high quality and a good price. He is able to cover some of his household expenses with what he earns from his work.

Marcos is asking for a loan to buy the necessary ingredients such as sugar, food colourings and flavourings etc. so he can continue with his production, as this is his only source of work. By doing this he will make better profits so he can give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy sugar, food colourings and flavourings etc.

loans.name: Rosa Angelica

texts.es: Rosa de 25 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y su hija de 7 años de edad. Rosa se dedica a la venta de ropa nueva en diferentes zonas de su localidad. De esta forma se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Desea mejorar el techo de su vivienda ya que se encuentra deteriorado por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina de fibrolite y madera para proceder a hacer el cambio de techo lo antes posible.
texts.en:
Rosa is 25 years old and lives in her own house with her life partner and her 7 year old daughter. Rosa makes a living selling new clothing in various districts in her local area. By doing this she earns an income and provides for her household. 

Rosa wants to improve the roof on her house as it is in a poor condition. This is why she is asking for this loan from FUSAI to buy cement sheeting and wood so she can go ahead and change the roof as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy cement sheets and wood to repair the roof of her home.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: la clienta de 26 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y su hijo, es muy conocida en la zona donde reside por su humildad y su entrega al trabajo, nunca se ha dejado vencer y siempre ha salido adelante con sus dificultades. Con esfuerzo y dedicación posee una tienda en la que vende productos de primera necesidad granos básicos, leche, huevos, arroz entre otros, es muy servicial a la hora de vender, es por eso que posee clientes que la buscan y la prefieren por sus productos. Se ha visto en la necesidad de surtir un poco mas la tienda debido al aumento de demanda y no tiene el capital para realizarlo, es por eso que la clienta solicita un crédito para comprar más productos como granos básicos producto instantáneo, golosinas, bebidas, etc. Confía en Dios de que pronto la ayuda solicitada, será otorgada, y no tendrá más preocupación que llevar el sustento diario a su hogar.
texts.en:
The client, 26, lives in her own house with her husband and her child.  She's very well known in the area where she lives for her modesty and her commitment to her job.  She never gives up and she always has overcome her difficulties.

Through her effort and dedication she has a store where she sells staples such as basic grains, milk, eggs, and rice.  She's very obliging when it comes time to make sales, which is why her customers seek her out and prefer her products.

The client needs to stock her store a little more because demand has increased.  She doesn't have the capital to do this, though, so she's requesting a loan to buy basic grains, instant food, candy, beverages, and other products.

She trusts in God that she'll receive help soon and not have to worry anymore about supporting her household.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, instant food, candy, beverages, etc.

loans.name: Maria Alicia

texts.es: Maria de 60 años de edad se dedica a la venta de todo tipo de productos de uso personal como lociones, desodorantes, cremas, perfumes, shampoo, cremas para el cabello, etc. su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas y con la ayuda de su hija logran solventar los gastos de su hogar, vive en casa propia con su hija y una prima, Maria desea acrecentar su negocio por eso solicta un credito que le permita poder comprar todo lo necesario como: perfumes, esmaltes para uñas, desodorantes, shampoo, cremas para el cabello, etc. ya que tiene mucha clientela por dar sus productos a precios accesibles con la ayuda solictada ella podra obtener mejores ganancias y asi seguira dandole a su famili lo que necesita sin limitacion alguna.
texts.en:
Maria, who is sixty years old, works selling all kinds of personal products like lotions, deodorants, creams, fragrances, shampoo, conditioner, etc. Her business is located in her home. The earnings she makes from her sales and the help she gets from her daughter allow them to cover their household expenses. She lives in her own home with her daughter and a cousin. 

Maria wants to make her business grow, which is why she is requesting a loan that will allow her to be able to buy everything she needs, such as fragrances, nail polish, deodorants, shampoo, conditioners, etc. She has a large customer base because she sells her products at affordable prices. With the help she is requesting, she will be able to make higher earnings so that she can continue giving her family what they need without any limitations.

loans.use: to buy fragrances, nail polish, shampoo, conditioners, etc.

loans.name: Karla Noemy

texts.es: Karla de 26 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y su pequeño hijo de  4 años de edad. Karla es una mujer que se caracteriza por ser muy trabajadora, responsable y dedicada. Ella se dedica a la venta de comida, frutas y bebidas desde hace mucho tiempo. Karla solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de arena, cemento, grava, lámina galvanizada y madera para encementar el piso de la vivienda y para reparar el techo de la misma ya que con el tiempo se ha deteriorado.
texts.en: Karla, 26, lives in her own home with her common-law husband and four-year-old son.  She is known for being very hard-working, responsible and dedicated.  For several years she has been earning a living selling food, fruits and beverages.  Karla is requesting a loan through FUSAI to buy sand, cement, gravel, metal sheeting and wood to put in a cement floor and repair the roof of her house which has deteriorated over time.

loans.use: To buy sand, cement, gravel, metal sheeting and wood to repair the roof and floor of her house.

loans.name: Maria Magdalena

texts.es: María de 33 años de edad  es madre soltera y habita en casa propia junto a sus dos hijos de 17 años y 13 años de edad. María se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras desde hace mucho tiempo. De esta forma se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Desea mejorar sus condiciones habitacionales y las de su familia por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, madera, cemento, arena y grava para reparar el techo de la vivienda y para encementar el piso de la misma.
texts.en: María, 33, is a single mother who lives in her own house with her two children, ages 17 and 13.  María sells fruits and vegetables and has been in business for several years in order to earn a living to support her family.  She wants to improve her living conditions and is requesting a loan through FUSAI to buy metal sheeting, wood, cement, sand and gravel to repair the roof of her home and put in cement flooring.

loans.use: To buy metal sheeting, wood, cement, sand and gravel to repair the roof of her house and put in a cement floor.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy bread, soft drinks, oils, vegetables, fruits, sweets, soap, shampoo, etc.

loans.name: Rina

texts.es: Rina de 43 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a sus hijos desde hace 20 años. Rina trabaja muy duro para mantener a su familia y darles mejores condiciones de vida. Rina se dedica a la elaboración de platillos típicos como yuca frita, tamales, pasteles y pupusas. Tiene 5 años de dedicarse al negocio por lo que ya cuenta con muchos clientes que cada día la prefieren más. Rina solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada y polines para proceder al cambio de techo de la vivienda ya que se encuentra deteriorado por causa del tiempo y las lluvias.
texts.en:
Rina, 43, has lived in her own house for 20 years together with her children.  She works very hard to support her family and give them better living conditions.  Rina has a business making typical dishes such as fried yucca, tamales, pastries and stuffed tortillas.  She has been in business for five years and therefore has many customers who like her products more and more each day.

Rina is requesting a loan through FUSAI to buy metal sheeting and beams to change the roof of her house since it has been damaged by the weather and rains.

loans.use: To buy metal sheeting and beams to repair the roof of her house.

loans.name: Rudy Adiel

texts.es: Rudy de 31 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus dos hijos. El posee un taller de costura en el lugar de su residencia donde confecciona diferentes tipos de prendas, últimamente se ha hecho de mucha clientela porque el trabajo que el realiza es excelente y lo vende a precios realmente accesibles; él es un hombre muy dedicado a su trabajo responsable y honesto, Rudy esta solicitando un crédito que le permita comprar: telas, hilos, agujas y todo lo relacioando con la costura para seguir satisfaciendo la necesidad de los clientes y asi el  podrá tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Rudy is 31 years old and lives in his own house with his wife and two children.  Rudy has a sewing workshop in his house, where he produces different clothing items.  Rudy has recently gained many customers because he does excellent work and his prices are very affordable.  Rudy is very dedicated to his work, and is responsible and honest.  Rudy is applying for a loan as it will allow him to buy material, threads, needles and other items related to his sewing work. With this he can continue to satisfy his customers' needs and he can enjoy a higher quality of life.

loans.use: to buy material, threads, needles and more.

loans.name: Sandra Marina

texts.es: Sandra de 20 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su grupo familiar desde hace mucho tiempo. Sandra se dedica a la prestación de servicios domésticos en una pupusería cercana a su localidad por lo que percibe un ingreso mensual. Desea mejorar sus condiciones habitacionales por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento, arena y grava para para encementar el piso del corredor de la vivienda.
texts.en: Sandra is 20 years old and has been living alongside her family in her own house for a long time now. Sandra works as a cleaner at a tortilla restaurant near her home.  She receives a monthly salary for this work. Sandra would like to improve her living conditions and so is applying to FUSAI for a loan in order to buy cement, sand and gravel to cement the floor of the hall in her home.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand and gravel to cement the floor of the hall in her home.

loans.name: Sara  Noemy

texts.es: sara de 37 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañero de vida y sus dos hijos, ella posee una tienda en su lugar de residencia tiene muchos años con su negocio y eso le ha regalado experiencia en las ventas que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias,es muy reconocida por los vecinos de la zona , se ha hecho de mucha clientela, pues tiene la tienda surtida, sara quiere acrecentar el negocio y realizar una nueva inversión pero necesita de capital por eso solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar lo necesario para su tienda como golosinas, granos basicos, aceite, arroz, azucar, refrescos, etc. asegura que cancelara la deuda y a la vez confía en que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida
texts.en: Sara is 37 years old and lives in her own house with her partner and their two children. Sara has been running a shop out of her home for many years.  As a result she now has good sales experience, allowing her to earn better profits.  Sara is well-known by locals and she has many customers as the shop is well stocked.  Sara wants to expand her business and invest more in it but she needs capital. She is therefore applying for a loan from "Integral".  This loan will allow her to buy necessary items for her shop, such as sweets, basic grains, oil, rice, sugar, soft drinks and more. Sara assures us that she will pay off her debt and she is also confident that this will give her family a higher quality of life.

loans.use: to buy sweets, basic grains, oil, rice, sugar, soft drinks and more.

loans.name: Transito

texts.es: Transito de 53 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposa y sus tres hijos de 22 años, 17 años y 9 años de edad. Transito presta servicios de seguridad en una empresa cercana a su localidad. Él es un hombre muy trabajador quien hace todo lo que este a su alcance para dar a su familia mejores condiciones de vida. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en el repello de las paredes de la vivienda y para poner ladrillos en el piso de la misma. Con el monto solicitad comprará cemento, arena, grava y ladrillo.
texts.en:
Transito is 53 years old and lives in his own house with his wife and their three children aged 22, 17 and 9. Transito works as a security guard at a company near his home. He is a very hard-working man who does everything he possibly can to give his family better living conditions.

Transito is asking FUSAI for this loan to plaster the walls of his home and pave the floor with bricks. He will use the sum requested to buy cement, sand, gravel and bricks.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, gravel and bricks to plaster the walls of his home and pave the floor with bricks.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: la clienta de 24 años de edad vive en casa propia con su madre, su hermano y sus dos hijos, es muy conocida en la zona donde reside por su humildad y su entrega al trabajo, nunca se ha dejado vencer y siempre ha salido adelante con sus dificultades. Con esfuerzo y dedicación posee una tienda en la que vende productos de primera necesidad granos básicos, leche, huevos, arroz entre otros, es muy dedicada a su labor y muy servicial a la hora de vender, es por eso que posee clientes que la buscan y la prefieren por sus productos. Se ha visto en la necesidad de surtir un poco mas la tienda debido al aumento de demanda y no tiene el capital para realizarlo, es por eso que la clienta solicita un crédito para comprar más productos como granos básicos producto instantáneo, golosinas, bebidas, etc. Confía en Dios de que pronto la ayuda solicitada, será otorgada, y no tendrá más preocupación que llevar el sustento diario a su hogar.
texts.en: This borrower, who is 24 years old, lives in her own house with her mother, her brother, and his two children. She is well known in the zone where she lives for her humility and her dedication to her work. She has never let herself be defeated, and she has always coped with her difficulties. As a result of her effort and dedication, she has a store where she sells basic products such as bulk grains, milk, eggs, and rice, among other items. She is very dedicated to her work and very helpful when she sells her products. This is why she has customers who seek her out and prefer her for her products.
