She has found it necessary to stock her store with a little more, due to the increase in demand, and she doesn't have the capital to do this. It is for this reason that the borrower is applying for a loan to buy more products such as bulk grains, instant products, candies, beverages, etc. She trusts in God that the help she has applied for will be granted soon, and she will have no more worries about providing the daily sustenance to her household.

loans.use: to buy bulk grains, milk, eggs, rice, instant products, candies, and beverages, among other items, for her store.

loans.name: Ana Emilia

texts.es: Ana de 33 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su compañera de vida y sus dos hijos de 17 años y 13 años de edad quienes se encuentran estudiando. Ana posee una pequeña tienda la cual con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado establecer. Ana desea terminar de cerrar la casa para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo,cemento, arena y hierro para terminar de construir la pared para cerrar la vivienda y así dar mayor seguridad a sus hijos.
texts.en: Ana, 33, lives in her own home with her partner and two children aged 17 and 13 years old who are attending school. Ana has a small shop into which she puts great effort. Ana wants to finish building her house. She requests a loan from FUSAI to invest in the purchase of brick, cement, sand, and iron to finish building a wall to complete her house and provide greater security for her children.

loans.use: to purchase bricks, cement, sand, and iron to build a wall and complete her house.

loans.name: Jesus Alexis

texts.es: Jesús de 23 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su compañera de vida y su madre. Jesús trabaja como jornalero desde hace dos años y de esta forma se gana la vida y mantiene la economía del hogar. Con el fin de mejorar su seguridad y la de su familia solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la construcción de un muro de retención frente a su vivienda. Con el monto solicitado comprará ladrillo, arena, cemento y hierro.
texts.en: Jesús, who is 23 years old, lives in his own house along with his life companion and his mother. Jesús has worked as a day laborer for two years, and in this way he earns a living and maintains the household economy. With the goal of improving his security and that of his family, he is applying to FUSAI for this loan, to invest in the construction of a retaining wall in front of his home. With the amount he has applied for, he will buy bricks, sand, cement, and iron.

loans.use: to buy bricks, sand, cement, and iron to construct a retaining wall.

loans.name: Ana Francisca

texts.es: Ana de 29 años de edad desde hace 7 años se dedica a la venta de ropa, productos para uso personal, colas y ganchos para el cabello, etc. su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia posee mucha clientela por la variedad de productos que comercializa, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas y con la ayuda de su esposo logran solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, vive en casa propia con sus dos hijos y su esposo, Ana esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas mercadería para surtir su negocio y asi darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Ana, 29, has been making her living in the sale of clothing, personal products, hair accessories, and other products for 7 years. Her business is located in her place of residence and she has a lot of customers because of the variety of products she sells. With her sales, she helps her husband manage household expenses. She lives at home with her two children and her husband. Ana is requesting a loan to buy more merchandise for her business and to also give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase clothing, personal products, hair products, and more to sell.

loans.name: Jose Raymundo

texts.es: José de 51 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposa y sus dos hijos gemelos de 16 años de edad quienes se encuentran estudiando. José se dedica a la prestación de servicios de seguridad desde hace dos años. De esta forma se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Desea encementar el piso de la vivienda para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento, arena y grava y así proceder a la mejora del piso lo antes posible.
texts.en: José, 51, lives in his own house with his wife and twin sons who are 16 years old and are studying. José has made his living in the provision of security services for 2 years. This job makes his living and brings sustenance into his home. He wants to build a concrete floor in his house. For this purpose, he requests a loan from FUSAI to invest in the purchase of cement, sand, and gravel so he can proceed to the improvement of the floor as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase cement, sand, and gravel to build a concrete floor in his home.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: la clienta de 25 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañero de vida y sus dos hijos, desde hace varios años se dedica a la crianza de pollos de engorde, los cuales después sale a comercializarlos a los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su lugar de residencia, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, la clienta esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de concentrado para los pollo y asi poder seguir con su trabajo ya que esa es su única fuente de ingresos y asi poder tener junto con su familia una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en: This borrower is 25 years old and lives in her own house with her partner and two children. For several years, she has made her living raising broiler chickens that she sells in different markets that are near her place of residence. With the sales she achieves, she provides for some household expenses. The borrower is requesting a loan to buy food pellets for her chickens and continue her work because it is the family's only source of income and can provide her family a better economic stability.

loans.use: to purchase food pellets for her chickens.

loans.name: Lorenzo

texts.es: Lorenzo de 48 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposa y sus 5 hijos quienese encuentran estudiando en la escuela pública de su localidad. Lorenzo se dedica a la siembra de maíz y frijoles desde hace mucho tiempo. Este oficio es su principal fuente de ingresos ya que su esposa se dedica  a los oficios domésticos del hogar y no recibe ninguna remuneración. Desea mejorar el piso de la vivienda por lo que solicita el crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento, ladrillo de piso, arena, grava, etc.
texts.en: Lorenzo is 48 years old. He lives in his own house together with his wife and 5 children who study in the local public school. Lorenzo has been growing beans and corn for many years. This activity is his principal source of income as his wife is a housewife and gets no salary. He wants to upgrade the floor of his home so he ie requesting a loan from FUSAI that he will invest in the purchase of cement, floor tile, sand, gravel, etc.

loans.use: to buy cement, floor tile, sand, gravel, etc.

loans.name: Mariana De Jesus

texts.es: Mariana de 60 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y sus hijos. Mariana se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza por catalogo desde hace 8 años y de esta forma se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Mariana desea construir una pila para reguardar el agua potable. Además, desea reparar el techo de la vivienda ya que se encuentra deteriorado y hay filtraciones cuando llueve. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, cemento, arena y lamina fibrolite.
texts.en: Mariana, who is 60 years old, lives in her own house along with her husband and their children. Mariana has been selling beauty products by catalog for 8 years, and in this way she earns a living and brings sustenance to her household. Mariana wants to build a trough to store potable water. In addition, she wants to repair the roof of her home, since it is deteriorated and there are leaks when it rains. To do this, she is applying to FUSAI for this loan to invest in the purchase of bricks, cement, sand, and Fibrolit laminated sheets.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, sand, and Fibrolit laminated sheets to construct a trough and repair the roof of her home.

loans.name: Hugo Francisco

texts.es: Hugo de 27 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su compañera de vida y sus dos hijos de dos años y 4 años de edad. Hugo trabaja como jornalero desde hace mucho tiempo en una finca cercana a su localidad. De esta forma se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Desea reparar el techo de la vivienda por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada y madera para proceder a la reparación del techo lo antes posible.
texts.en: Hugo is 27 years old. He lives in his own house with his life companion and their two children, aged 2 and 4 years old. Hugo has been working as day labor on a farm close to his community for a long time. This is his way to earn his living and sustain his household. He wants to repair the roof of his house so he has requested a loan from FUSAI. He will invest it in buying laminated sheeting and wood and proceed with the roof repair as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy galvanized sheeting and wood to repair the roof of his house.

loans.name: Edgar Amilcar

texts.es: Edgar de 51 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposa y su hijo de 18 años. Edgar es un hombre visionario, trabajador y comprometido con su familia. Él desea mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, cemento y arena para enladrillar el piso de la vivienda y así contar con mejores condiciones para él y para su familia.
texts.en: Edgar is 51 years old. He lives in his own house together with his wife and 18 year old son. Edgar is a visionary, hard-working man who is committed to his family. He wants to improve the living conditions of his family so he is requesting a loan from FUSAI. He will invest it in purchasing tiles, cement and sand to tile over the floors of his house and enjoy better living conditions for his family and himself.

loans.use: to buy tiles, cement and sand to finish the floor of his house.

loans.name: Nasario

texts.es: Nasario de 55 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposa y sus hijos desde hace mucho tiempo. Él trabja como carpintero, albañil y agricultor desde hace 30 años. De esta forma se gana la vida y hace todo lo que este a su alcance para dar a su familia mejores condiciones. Nasario desea terminar  las paredes y el techo de su vivienda ya que por falta de recursos económicos no ha logrado terminar por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, cemento, arena y lámina de galvanizada para terminar la vivienda.
texts.en: Nasario is 55 years old. He has lived in his own house with his wife and children for a long time. He has been working as a carpenter, bricklayer and farmer for 30 years. This is how he makes his living and how he manages to provide his family with better living conditions. Nasario wants to finish the walls and roof of his house which he has not been able to finish for want of  economic resources. So he is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in the purchase of bricks, cement, sand and laminated sheeting to finish his house.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, sand and laminated sheeting to complete his house.

loans.name: Maria Antonia

texts.es: Maria de 65 años de edad vive en casa propia con su hijo y su nuera, desde hace varios años se dedica a la venta de chorizos, su negocio lo tiene ubicado en el mercado que se encuentra cerca de su lugar de residencia, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Doña Maria esta solicitando un credito para la compra de chorizos por mayor para poder seguir con trabajo ya que esa es su única fuente de ingresos y asi tener una mejor calidad de vida junto con su familia.
texts.en: Maria is 65 years old. She lives in her own home with her son and daughter-in-law. For the past several years she has been selling chorizo (sausages). Her business is located in a market close to her residence. She manages to pay some of the household expenses with what she sells. Maria is requesting a loan to buy chorizo wholesale so she can continue to work. This is her only source of income and she wants to enjoy a higher quality of living along with her family.

loans.use: to buy chorizo wholesale.

loans.name: Adolfo

texts.es: Adolfo de 51 años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos en casa propia, el se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol, tiene 15 años de trabajar en la agricultura y eso le  ha regalado mucha experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores cosechas, sus cosechas las comercia en los alrededores de la comunidad, ya tiene mucha clientela que lo prefieren por la calidad, los buenos precios y sobre todo por el buen servicio; el necesita invertir en sus cultivos por eso solicita un credito que le permita comprar semillas de maíz, frijol, insecticida, herbicida, etc. Adolfo tiene buenas referencias de pago por parte de sus conocidos, y es muy responsable, asegura que podrá cancelar la deuda en el periodo establecido y a la vez confía que llevara a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
Adolfo is 51 years old. He lives with his life companion and their children in their own home. He grows beans and corn. He has 15 years experience in agriculture and this has given him the experience to produce good harvests. He sells his product around his community as he has many clients who prefer him for the quality, good prices and most of all for his good service.

Adolfo needs to invest in his crops so he is requesting a loan which will permit him to buy corn and bean seeds, insecticide, herbicide, etc. Adolfo has good references as to repayment from the people who know him and he is very responsible. He assures us that he will be able to pay the loan in the established time period and at the same time he is confident that he can create financial security for his household.

loans.use: to buy corn and bean seeds, insecticide and herbicide, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy perfume, nail polish, deodorant, shampoo, lotions, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La clienta de 26 años de edad vive en casa de un familiar con su esposo y sus dos hijos, ella se dedica a la venta de todo tipo de ropa en el mercado quese encuentra cerca de su lugar de residencia, con las ganancias que obtiene y con la ayuda de sus esposo logran cubrir los gastos que tienen en su hogar, la clienta desea acrecentar su negocio con mas mercaderia paro no tiene suficiente capital para poder realizarlo por eso solicita  INTEGRAL un prestamo que le permita comprar mas: camisas, pantalones, blusas, faldas, entre otras cosas para obtener mejores ingresos y darle a su familia lo que necesita sin limitacion alguna.
texts.en:
The client is 26 years old. She lives in the house of a family member with her husband and their two children. She sells all types of clothing in a market close to her home. With what she earns and with the help of her husband they manage to cover the household expenses.

The client wants to expand her business with more merchandise but she doesn't have the capital to do it herself. So she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL which will allow her to buy more shirts, pants, blouses, skirts, etc. in order to generate more income and provide her family with what it needs.

loans.use: to buy more shirts, pants, blouses, skirts, etc.

loans.name: Natividad Adan

texts.es: Natividad es un hombre trabajador de 54 años de edad quien habita junto a su grupo familiar en casa propia. Natividad se dedica al comercio de tienda la cual con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado establecer en su lugar de habitación. Desea mejorar el techo de la vivienda por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para hacer el desembolso para la compra de lámina, madera y pines. Espera poder contar con este financiamiento y así dar a su familia mejores condiciones habitacionales.
texts.en:
Natividad is a hard-working man of 54 who lives with his family in his own house. Natividad has a store, which with a great deal of effort he has managed to set up in his home. 

He wishes to improve the roof of his home, so he is requesting this loan from FUSAI so that he can make the expenditure for the purchase of sheet metal roofing, wood and other materials. He hopes to be able to have this loan, and this way provide his family with better housing conditions.

loans.use: To buy sheet metal roofing, wood and other materials for repairing the roof of his home.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: la clienta de 27 años de edad vive en casa propia con su familia, ella se dedica a la venta de zapatos, lo hace de forma ambulante por las diferentes colonias que se encuentran cerca de su lugar de residencia, posee mucha clientela por la calidad de sus productos, lo buenos precios y la amabilidad que tiene a la hora de vender, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas ayuda en los gastos de su hogar, la clienta esta solicitando un credito para la compra de zapatos por mayor y surtir con mas estilos su negocio y asi obtener mejores ganancias para tener una mejor calidad de vida junto con su familia.
texts.en:
The borrower is 27 years old and lives in her own home with her family. She works selling shoes, which she does from place to place in the various communities near where she lives. She has many customers because of the quality of her products, good prices and friendly service. She uses the income from her sales to help with household expenses.

The borrower is requesting a loan to buy shoes at wholesale prices and to stock her business with more styles. She hopes to improve her profits and her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy shoes at wholesale prices and to stock her business with more styles.

loans.name: Jose Angel Porfirio

texts.es: jose de de 37 años de edad posee su propia granja de cerdos en la cual se dedica a comprar cerdos tiernos los cuales cría y posteriormente comercializa. El negocio esta ubicado en su lugar de residencia por lo que cuenta con un lugar muy apto para este tipo de trabajo, Jose es una persona muy responsable y trabajadora quien ha sacado adelante a su familia vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus tres hijos. Desde hace 7 años que se dedica a este trabajo, el cual ha ido creciendo poco a poco, a pesar de esto él cuenta con una cantidad de clientes muy aceptable, por lo que desea contar con mayor cantidad de cerdos para extender aún más su negocio, es por esto que él solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda invertir comprando: concentrado para cerdos, vitaminas, y así mismo mejorar el lugar en el cual habitan sus crías, de manera que el estándar de calidad sea aún más alto y así brindar un mejor servicio, el cual le permita mejorar sus ganancias.
texts.en: Jose is 37 years old and has his own pig farm, where he buys and sells piglets, raises them, then sells them.  His business is located in his home, where he has a very good place for this type of work.  Jose is a very responsible and hardworking person who has gotten his family ahead.  He lives in a home of his own with his wife and three children.  He has been doing this type of work for seven years and has been growing it little by little and he has a good number of customers.  He wants to have a large number of pigs to grow the business even more, so he is asking for a loan to buy feed and vitamins for his pigs and improve their area so the they will be of better quality and he will improve his earnings.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for his pigs.

loans.name: Elia Marleny

texts.es: Elia de 53 años de edad vive en casa propia con su madre y su hermano, Ella posee una tienda de productos comestibles como pan, refrescos, aceites, verduras, frutas, golosinas y también de primera necesidad como: jabón y shampoo entre otras cosas tiene su negocio en su casa de habitación y posee mucha clientela por la variedad de productos que comercializa. Elia solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda surtir aún más la tienda de manera que pueda atender mejor a sus clientes y de esta misma forma mejorar sus ventas lo cual es su prioridad para sacar adelante su hogar.
texts.en: Elia is 53 years old and lives in a home of her own with her mother and brother.  She has a food store where she sells things like bread, soft drinks, cooking oils, vegetables, fruits, snacks, and also personal products like soap and shampoo among other things out of her home.  She has many customers because of the products she sells.  She is asking for this loan so she can stock her store and better serve her customers and increase her sales.  This is her priority so she can get her household ahead.

loans.use: to stock her store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy feed for her chickens and to improve the place where she keeps them.

loans.name: Reyna Isabel

texts.es: Reyna de 44 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y su hija, Ella posee una venta de ropa tiene de diferentes estilos y  para todas las personas damas, caballeros, niños y niñas, la ropa que comercia es de muy buena calidad y la vende a precios accesibles es por eso que se ha hecho de mucha clientela últimamente; Reyna es muy activa siempre se encuentra trabajando luchando por salir adelante. Para Reyna el propósito y coraje que le pone a su labor tiene una dirección ver crecer el negocio para lograr un mejor futuro, es por eso que se decidió solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar ropa en variedad como faldas, pantalones, blusas, camisetas, trajes etc. Así siempre podrá satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes. Reyna tiene la esperanza que de esta forma lograra darle a su familia seguridad económica y una vida plena.
texts.en: Reyna is 44 years old and lives in a home of her own with her husband and daughter.  She sells clothing of different styles for women, men, boys and girls.  Her merchandise is of good quality at affordable prices so she has had many customers lately.  Reyna is very active and always striving to get ahead.  For Reyna, the purpose and courage that she puts into her work is directed toward growing her business to provide for a better future, therefore she is asking for a loan through INTEGRAL to buy a variety of clothing such as skirts, pants, blouses, shirts, suits, etc.  In this way she will be able to satisfy her customer needs. Reyna hopes that she will be able to provide more security and a better life for her family.

loans.use: to buy clothing.

loans.name: Nery  Elizabeth

texts.es: Nery de 43 años de edad vive junto a su esposo y sus hijos; Ella se dedica a la venta de tortillas, tiene varios años con este trabajo y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia que le permite obtener los mejores resultados, su  negocio esta ubicado en una zona muy estratégica y frecuentada por las personas de la comunidad, es muy conocida pues sus tortillas son las mas ricas y siempre están calientitas, tiene mucha clientela y la buscan por su excelente calidad, buenos precios y sobre todo el servicio mas rápido; Nery es una mujer luchadora, entregada a su labor, su mas grande meta es alcanzar el triunfo y se esfuerza día con día para ganarse ese futuro mas próspero; en estos últimos meses ha aumentado la demanda y quiere aprovechar para aumentar su inversión pero no posee de suficiente capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz por mayor, y mejorar la cocina donde cose el maiz que es la que muestra en la fotografía,  ella tiene buenas referencias de pago por parte de sus conocidos y se hace responsable del pago completo de la deuda, y a la vez tiene la esperanza que podrá darle a su familia una vida mejor.
texts.en:
Nery is 43 years old and lives with her husband and children. She has worked for a number of years now selling tortillas, which has allowed her to gain a lot of experience and to obtain the best results. Her business is strategically located in an area frequented by the members of her community. She is well known because her tortillas are the most delicious and are always warm. She has many customers, who look for her because of her excellent quality, good prices, and above all, quick service.

Nery has a fighting spirit and is very devoted to her work. Her greatest goal is to triumph in life and work hard every day to win a more prosperous future.

In recent months Nery has seen increased demand for her tortillas, and she would like to take advantage of this opportunity to invest in her business, but she does not have enough capital. This is why she is requesting a loan from Apoyo Integral to buy corn at wholesale prices and to improve the kitchen where she cooks it, which is the kitchen shown in the photograph. Nery has good payment references from those who know her, and she takes full responsibility for the complete payment of the loan. She hopes to give her family a better life.

loans.use: to buy corn at wholesale prices and to improve the kitchen where she makes tortillas.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: Maria vive en casa propia con su esposo y su hija, ella se dedica a la elaboración y venta de quesadillas su negocio lo tiene ubicado en el lugar de su residencia, su esposo le ayuda con el negocio y su hija trabaja y le ayuda económicamente, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Doña Maria esta solicitando un credito para la compra de los ingredientes necesarios para seguir elaborando dicho alimento como: harina, queso, azucar, leche, etc. y asi seguir con su negocio y obtener mejores ganancias para darle a su familia una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
Maria lives in her own home with her husband and daughter. She works making and selling quesadillas. Her business is located in her home. Her husband helps her with her business, and her daughter works and helps her financially. Maria uses the income from her sales to pay for some of their household expenses.

Maria is requesting this loan to buy the ingredients she needs to continue making her quesadillas, such as flour, cheese, sugar and milk. She hopes to continue with her business and improve her profits so that she can give her family better economic stability.

loans.use: to buy flour, cheese, sugar and milk to make quesadillas.

loans.name: Saul Alfredo

texts.es: Saúl de 23 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su madre desde hace mucho tiempo. Él se dedica a la venta de ropa nueva en las principales zonas de su localidad y de esta forma se gana la vida y ayuda con la economía del hogar. Desea encementar el piso de la vivienda por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para comprar cemento, arena y grava  y así proceder lo antes posible a mejorar el piso y así dar a su madre mejores condiciones habitacionales.
texts.en: Saúl, 23, has lived in his own home with his mother for a long time. He makes a living selling new clothes in the primary areas of town. This allows him to earn money and help with household expenses. He wants to add cement to the floor of his home as soon as possible, which is why he is requesting a loan from FUSAI to buy cement, sand, and gravel. This will give his mother better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, and gravel to add a cement floor to her home.

loans.name: Luis Arnoldo

texts.es: Luis de 28 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a sus padres y hermanos. Luis es albañil y se dedica a este oficio desde hace 7 años. Luis trabaja muy duro  para ayudar a su familia con los gastos del hogar. Desea mejorar sus condiciones habitacionales por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la reparación del techo de la vivienda y para encementar el piso ya que en la actualidad es de tierra. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, madera, cemento, arena y grava.
texts.en: Luis is 28 years old. He lives in his own home with his parents and siblings. Luis is a bricklayer and has practiced this trade for 7 years. Luis works very hard to help his family with the household expenses. He wants to improve his living conditions and that is why he is asking FUSAI for a loan to invest in repairing the roof on the house and to cement the floor because it is a dirt floor. Because of this he is asking FUSAI for a loan to invest in buying galvanized sheeting, wood, cement, sand and gravel.

loans.use: to buy galvanized sheeting, wood, sand and gravel to repair the roof on the house and to cement the floor.

loans.name: Maria Claribel

texts.es: María de 29 años de edad habita en casa propia y se dedica a la venta de variedad de frutas desde hace mucho tiempo. Este negocio es su principal fuente de ingresos y es así como se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Desea mejorar las paredes de la vivienda para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, madera y clavos.
texts.en: Maria, 29, lives in her own home and has made a living selling a variety of fruit for a long time. This business is her primary source of income and it is how she earns a living and supports her family. She wants to improve the walls of her home so she is requesting this loan from FUSAI to invest in buying galvanized laminate, wood, and nails.

loans.use: to buy galvanized laminate, wood, and nails to repair the walls of her home.

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es: Francisco de 53 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su compañera de vida y su grupo familiar. Francisco trabaja muy duro en un taller por lo que cada mes percibe un salario lo cual le permite llevar el sustento a su hogar. Con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado construir su pequeña casa la cual aun le hace falta el corredor y encementar el piso de la misma. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, polines, cemento, arena y grava para construir el corredor de la vivienda y encementar el piso de la misma.
texts.en: Francisco is 53 years old. He lives in his own home with his life's companion and family group. Francisco works very hard in a workshop where he earns a monthly salary that allows him to support his household. With much effort, he has been able to build his little house although it still needs the corridor and for the floor to be cemented. Because of this, he is asking for this loan from FUSAI to invest in buying galvanized sheeting, poles, cement, sand and gravel to build the corridor for the house and to cement the floor.

loans.use: to buy galvanized sheeting, poles, cement, sand, and gravel to build the corridor of his house and  cement the floor.

loans.name: Maria Catalina

texts.es: María se dedica a la venta de verduras en el mercado central de su localidad. Tiene 42 años de edad y habita junto a su grupo familiar en casa sencilla pero propia. Actualmente, las paredes de la vivienda se encuentran deterioradas por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, cemento y arena para reparar las paredes de la vivienda y así dar mayor seguridad a su familia.
texts.en: Maria, 42, makes a living selling vegetables in the town's central market. She lives with her family in a house that is small, but it is their own. Currently, the walls of this home are deteriorating, so she is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in buying bricks, cement, and sand to repair the walls in her home, which will make her family more safe.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, and sand to repair the walls of her home.

loans.name: Fatima Elizabeth

texts.es: Fatima de 34 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su hija de 7 años de edad quien se encuentra estudiado en la escuela pública de su localidad. Fatima se dedica a la venta de variedad de verduras en el mercado central de su localidad. Es una mujer muy trabajadora quien hace todo lo que este a su alcance para dar a su hija mejores condiciones de vida. Desea mejorar sus condiciones habitacionales por lo que  solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada y clavos para reparar las paredes de la vivienda ya que se encuentran deterioradas.
texts.en: Fatima, 34, lives in her own home with her 7-year-old daughter, who goes to the local public school. Fatima sells a variety of vegetables in the central market in town. She is a very hard-working woman who does everything possible to give her daughter the best living conditions. She wants to improve her home, which is why she is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in buying galvanized laminate and nails to repair the walls of her home since they are deteriorating.

loans.use: to buy galvanized laminate and nails to repair walls in her home.

loans.name: Jose Martin

texts.es: José de 25 años de de edad es soltero y habita en casa propia junto a su grupo familiar desde hace mucho tiempo. José es un joven muy trabajador quien se dedica a la agricultura y ganadería desde hace cuatro años. De esta forma se gana la vida y colabora con la economía del hogar. Desea mejorar el techo y el piso de la vivienda por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, madera, cemento, arena y grava para reparar el techo de la vivida  y para encementar el piso de la misma.
texts.en:
José is 25 years old, single and has been living in his own home with his family for a long time. José is a very hard-working young man who has been farming and raising livestock for four years. This is how he earns a living and contributes to the finances of his household. 

He wishes to improve the roof and floor of the home, so he is requesting this loan from FUSAI in order to buy sheet metal roofing, wood, cement, sand and gravel. This is for repairing the roof and installing a cement floor in the home.

loans.use: To buy sheet metal roofing, wood, cement, sand and gravel, for repairing the roof and for installing a cement floor in the home.

loans.name: Elba Miriam

texts.es: Elba es una mujer trabajadora quien a sus 53 años de edad habita junto a su esposo y se dedica a la venta de pupusas(preparación alimenticia a base de masa de maíz, fijoles y queso). Dicho negocio lo tiene desde hace 10 años por lo que ya cuenta con mucha experiencia y muchos clientes que cada día la prefieren más. Elba desea mejorar el techo y el corredor de su vivienda dado que se encuentra dañado por causa del tiempo y las lluvias. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, polines, y pines para proceder a las mejoras lo antes posible.
texts.en: Elba, 53, is very hard-working and lives with her husband. She works by selling pupusas (food made with corn dough, beans, and cheese). She has had this business for 10 years and she has a lot of experience in this field. She has many customers who prefer to buy from her. Elba wants to improve the roof and hallway of her home because it's been damaged by the weather and the rain. In order to make these repairs as soon as possible, she is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in buying galvanized laminate, poles, and pins.

loans.use: to buy galvanized laminate, poles, and pins to improve the roof and hallway of her home.

loans.name: Cruz Maria

texts.es: Cruz de 40 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a sus hijos de 23 años, 20 años y 7 años de edad. Cruz se dedica a la venta de ropa nueva y usada de forma ambulante. Ella es una mujer muy trabajadora, responsable y dedicada. Desea mejorar el techo de su vivienda para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, madera y clavos para reparar el techo de la vivienda lo antes posible.
texts.en:
Cruz, 40, lives with her children –aged 23, 20 and 7– in a house of their own. Cruz sells new and second-hand clothes as a street vendor. She is a hardworking, responsible and dedicated woman.

She wants to repair the roof of her house and this is why she is requesting a loan at FUSAI. She will buy galvanized metal sheets, wood and nails to repair the roof as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy galvanized metal sheets, wood and nails to repair the roof of her house.

loans.name: Jesus Hortensia

texts.es: Jesús de 49 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposa y sus dos hijos de 16 años y 19 años de edad. Jesús se dedica  a la venta de platillos típicos como pastelitos de carne, pupusas, etc. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la construcción de un baño con ducha para lo cual necesita comprar: ladrillo, hierro, cemento, y arena.
texts.en:
Jesús, 49, lives with her husband and two children aged 16 and 19 in a house of their own. Jesús sells traditional food, such as meat pies, pupusas [thick corn tortillas], etc.

She is requesting a loan at FUSAI to build a bathroom with a shower. For this, she needs to buy bricks, iron bars, cement and sand.

loans.use: to buy bricks, iron bars, cement and sand to build a bathroom with shower.

loans.name: Luis Francisco

texts.es: Luis de 45 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus tres hijos, el se dedica a la pesca artesanal desde hace varios años, tiene mucha clientela ya que su producto es fresco y a precios realmente accesibles, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gasto de su hogar, luis está solicitando un crédito para poder comprar trasmallos para la pesca ya que esa es su unica fuente de trabajo y así poder obtener mejores ganancias para darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Luis is 45 years old. He lives with his wife and three children in a house of their own. He has been working as an artisan fisherman for some years now and has many customers, because he sells a fresh and affordable product. With the profits he makes, he manages to cover some of the home expenses.

Luis is requesting a loan to buy fishing nets for his job, which is his only source of income. This way, he will make more profits and will be able to improve his family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fishing nets.

loans.name: Zulma Yamileth

texts.es: Zulma de 21 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida desde hace mucho tiempo. Ella se dedica  al comercio de tienda en la cual vende variedad de productos de primera necesidad. Zulma desea mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento, arena y grava para encementar el piso de la vivienda ya que actualmente es de tierra.
texts.en: Zulma, 21, has lived in her own home with her life partner for many years. She makes a living by running a store, where she sells basic necessity products. Zulma wants to improve the living conditions in her home, which is why she is requesting a loan from FUSAI to buy cement, sand, and gravel to add a cement floor to her home, which is currently dirt.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, and gravel to add a cement floor to her home.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: la clienta de 24 años de edad vive con su esposo y su hijo, ella tiene un negocio de salon de belleza desde hace 1 años en su lugar de residencia, trabaja de 9:00 am a 7:00 pm tiene mucha clientela pues trabaja muy bien, con las ganancias que obtiene y con la ayuda de su esposo logran solventar los gastos de su hogar. la clienta  solicita un credito para poder comprar productos para su salon de belleza como: cremas, shampoos, ganchos para el cabello, tijeras, entre otras cosas que necesita y asi podra obtener mejores ganancias que le ayudaran a tener una mejor estabilidad economica.
texts.en:
This borrower is 24 years old. She lives with her husband and son and has had a beauty salon at home for a year. She works from 9:00 am to 7:00 pm and has many clients who appreciate her service. With the profits she makes and with the help of her husband, they cover the home expenses.

She is requesting a loan to buy different products for her salon, such as creams, shampoos, hair slides, scissors and other things she needs. This way she will be able to make more profits and help her family achieve financial stability.

loans.use: to buy creams, shampoos, hair slides and scissors, among other things.

loans.name: Dimas Antonio

texts.es: Dimas de 50 años de edad habita en casa propia  y trabaja como fontanero y electricista desde hace 13 años. Dimas es un hombre muy trabajador quien hace todo lo que este a su alcance para mantener la economía del hogar. Dimas solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la reparación del techo del corredor de la vivienda ya que se encuentra deteriorado y desea mejorar sus condiciones habitacionales. Con el monto solicitado comprará lámina galvanizada, polines y clovos.
texts.en:
Dimas is 50 years old and lives in a house of his own. He has been working as a plumber and electrician for thirteen years. Dimas is a hardworking man who does everything he can to keep his economy in balance.

Dimas is requesting this loan at FUSAI to repair the roof of his house’s corridor, which is in bad shape. He wants to improve his living conditions, so he will buy galvanized metal sheets, beams and nails with the requested amount.

loans.use: to buy galvanized metal sheets, beams and nails to repair his roof.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sand, cement, bricks, iron bars and other construction materials.

loans.name: Sixto Doroteo

texts.es: Sixto de 51 años de edad vive en casa propia junto a su esposa y sus dos hijos de 15 y 9 años de edad, ellos estudian actualmente, el se dedica a la venta de ropa tiene 10 años con el negocio y eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, el negocio esta ubicado en su lugar de residencia y también vende de forma ambulante , se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues las personas saben que todo es de calidad, a precios accesibles. Sixto quiere realizar una nueva inversión, pero no posee de suficiente capital que la respalde por eso solicita un crédito que le permita comprar blusas, faldas, camisetas, pantalones y todo los necesario para su negocio, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez tiene la esperanza que llevara a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
Sixto, 51, lives in his own home with his wife and their two children, aged 15 and 9.  Their children are currently in school.  Sixto has had a business selling clothing for 10 years; this has given him a lot of experience that enables him to obtain better earnings.  His business is located in his home, and he also goes out to sell from place to place.  He's attracted a lot of customers, because people know that everything he has is of good quality, and his prices are affordable.  

Sixto want to make a new investment in his business, but he lacks the funds to do so. This is why he is requesting a loan to purchase blouses, skirts, T-shirts, pants, and everything he needs for his business.  He is certain that he will be able to pay off the debt, and he also hopes to bring financial security to his household.

loans.use: to buy blouses, skirts, T-shirts, pants, etc.

loans.name: Sonia Esmeralda

texts.es: Sonia de 36 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su grupo familiar desde hace mucho tiempo. Sonia trabaja como promotora de salud en una institución cercana a su localidad y así se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Sonia habita en casa muy sencilla y desea invertir en la reparación del techo de la vivienda ya que se encuentra en mal estado. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, vara de castilla y madera.
texts.en:
Sonia, 36, has lived with her family in her own home for a long time.  She works as a health officer in an institution close to her home.  This is how she earns a living and supports her household.  

Sonia lives in a very modest home. She wants to invest in some improvements to the roof of the house, since it is in bad condition.  She is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in sheets of corrugated metal, bamboo poles, and wood.

loans.use: to buy sheets of corrugated metal, bamboo poles, and wood to repair the roof of her house

loans.name: Josefina

texts.es: Josefina de 51 años de edad vive con su esposo en casa propia, ella es una persona muy trabajador y  responsable, Josefina se dedica a la venta de ropa nueva y usada la comercializa de forma ambulante por distintas colonias y barrios que se encuentran cerca de su lugar de residencia. Desea mejorar sus ventas por eso solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, con el cual pueda comprar mayor cantidad de ropa para poder surtir su negocio y asi obtener mejores ganancias para tener una mejor calidad de vida junto con su esposo.
texts.en:
Josefina, 51, lives with her husband in her own home.  She is a very hardworking and responsible person.  Josefina has a business selling new and used clothing.  She sells from place to place in the various neighborhoods that are located close to her home.  

Josefina wants to increase her sales, and so she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL to buy clothing in bulk.  This way, she can stock up her business and thereby obtain more income, so that she and her husband can have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy clothing at wholesale

loans.name: Vitelio

texts.es: Vitelio de 40 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposa y sus hijos desde hace 13 años. Vitelio es un hombre trabajador quien se dedica a la prestación de servicios de seguridad en una fábrica cercana a su localidad. Con el objetivo de mejorar sus condiciones de vida desea construir un cuarto dormitorio para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, cemento, arena, hierro y lámina galvanizada.
texts.en:
Vitelio, who is forty years old, has been living in the home he owns with his wife and their children for thirteen years. Vitelio is a hard worker. He works providing security services for a factory near the town where he lives. 

In order to improve his living conditions, he wants to build another bedroom in his home. That is why he is requesting this loan from FUSAI, so that he can invest in purchasing bricks, cement, sand, iron, and sheet metal.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, sand, iron, and sheet metal for building a bedroom.

loans.name: Manuel De Jesus

texts.es: Manuel de 60 años de edad es una persona muy trabajadora y responsable quien vive junto con su familia. Manuel  se dedica a la pesca artesanal, contando con una pequeña lancha y algunas redes para obtener mariscos. Él se ha dedicado prácticamente toda su vida a esta actividad, la cual incluso ahora le permite salir adelante. El solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda contar con el dinero necesario para invertir en la compra de más redes para pescar, también anzuelos y otros instrumentos necesarios para realizar la pesca diariamente. Manuel desea darles una mejor vida a su familia en donde puedan contar con todo lo necesario.
texts.en:
Manuel, 60, is a very hardworking and responsible person who lives with his family.  He is a fisherman; he has a small boat and some nets he uses to catch fish.  He has spent just about all of his life doing this kind of work, and this is how he is providing for his family.  

Manuel is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL so that he can have the money he needs to invest in more fishing nets, hooks, and other equipment he needs to do his daily fishing.  Manuel want to give his family a better life where they can have everything they need.

loans.use: to buy fishing nets, hooks, and other fishing equipment

loans.name: Raul Ernesto

texts.es: Raul de 44 años de edad, vive con esposa y sus tres hijos en casa propia, Raul es un hombre trabajador, responsable y muy emprendedor, desde hace 6 años se dedica a la  producción y venta de productos lácteos en la zona donde reside. Tiene muy buena clientela ya que ha sabido ganarse la confianza de sus clientes. Ofrece calidad y buenos precios en sus productos, ha decidido invertir en el cuidado de sus ganados ya que de eso depende su negocio. Por eso ha solicitado un crédito para poder comprar vitaminas para el ganado y ajustar para la compra de una vaca lechera que le permita crecer en el negocio. Con esto espera obtener resultados favorables y continuar brindando la ayuda económica a su hogar que tanto lo necesita.
texts.en:
Raul, 44, lives with his wife and 3 children in his own home.  He is a hardworking and responsible man who is also very enterprising.  For 6 years, Raul has been producing and selling dairy products in the area where he lives.  He has a good customer base, because he has known how to win the confidence of his customers.  He offers quality products at good prices.  

Raul has decided to invest in the care of his livestock, because his business depends on it.  This is why he is requesting a loan to buy vitamins for his cattle, and to buy another dairy cow so that he can expand his business.  With this investment, he hopes to obtain favorable results so that he can continue to help his household financially and give his family everything they need.

loans.use: to buy vitamins for his cattle, and to buy a dairy cow

loans.name: Juan Nelson

texts.es: Juan de 44 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus tres hijos, desde hace 13 años se dedica a trabajar en su camión haciendo viajes por las diferentes colonias donde el reside, las personas lo buscan por que es muy responsable a la hora de manejar y hace sus viajes a buen precio y con mucha amabilidad los atiende, por eso tiene mucha cliente, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra cubrir algunos gastos de su hogar, Juan solicita un crédito para la compra repuestos para su vehículo ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo y asi poder llevar a su familia seguridad económica a su familia.
texts.en:
Juan, 44, lives in his own home with his wife and three children.  He has been working with his truck for 13 years, making trips to the different neighborhoods surrounding his home.  People seek his business because he is a very responsible driver, and he makes trips for a good price and with friendly service.  For this reason, he has a lot of customers.  With his earnings from this business, he covers some of the household expenses.  

Juan is requesting a loan to buy spare parts for his vehicle, because this is his only source of work.  This way, he will be able to provide his family with financial security.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for his vehicle

loans.name: Fredi Mauricio

texts.es: Fredi de 60 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa, su hijo y sus suegros, desde hace 1 año se dedica a trabajar en su propio vehiculo realizando viajes por las diferentes colonias que se encuentran cerca de su lugar de residencia, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar algunos gatso de su hogar, Fredi esta solicitando un credito a INTEGRAL para poder comprar repuestos y llantas para su vehiculo ya que esa es su unica fuenet de trabajo y asi poder obtener mejores ganancias para darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Fredi, 60, lives in his own house with his wife, son, and in-laws.

He has worked for a year with his own vehicle making trips to the various communities near his home.  He manages to pay some of his household expenses with what he makes from his job.

Fredi's asking Integral for a loan to buy parts and tires for his vehicle.  It's his only source of work and this way he can earn more profits to give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy tires and parts for his vehicle

loans.name: Wendi Elizabeth

texts.es: Wendi de 21 años de edad es madre soltera y habita en casa propia junto a su pequeño hijo de tres años de edad. Ella se dedica al comercio de tienda la cual con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado establecer. Desea mejorar sus condiciones habitacionales por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la introducción de la energía eléctrica y para comprar y  lámina galvanizada y madera para reparar el techo de la vivienda el cual se encuentra deteriorado.
texts.en:
Wendi, 21, is a single mother.  She lives in her own house with her young three-year-old.  She makes a living as a merchant in a store she set up with a lot of effort.

Wendi wants to improve the condition of her house.  She's asking FUSAI for a loan to invest in electricty and to buy galvanized metal and wood to repair her roof, which is deteriorated.

loans.use: to install electricity and to repair her roof

loans.name: Nolvi Evedit

texts.es: Nolvi de 43 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y su y sus dos hijos. Ella se dedica a la venta de antojitos típicos como pastelitos de carne, yuca frita, enchiladas, etc. Tiene 8 años de dedicarse al negocio  por lo que ya cuenta con muchos clientes que cada día la prefieren más. Nolvi desea construir un pequeño cuarto dormitorio por lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, cemento, arena, hierro, puertas, ventanas y lámina galvanizada. Espera poder contar con este financiamiento ya que no cuenta con los recursos económicos para hacerlo por su cuenta.
texts.en:
Nolvi, who is 43 years old, lives in the home she owns with her husband and their two children. She works selling traditional food items like meat pies, fried yuca, enchiladas, etc. She has been in this business for eight years, so she already has many customers who prefer her more and more each day. 

Nolvi wants to build a small bedroom, which is why she is requesting this loan from FUSAI. It will allow her to invest in purchasing bricks, cement, sand, iron, doors, windows, and corrugated sheet metal. She needs this financing because she doesn't have the financial resources to carry out the project on her own.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, sand, iron, doors, windows, and sheet metal to build a bedroom.

loans.name: Douglas Ernesto

texts.es: Douglas de 36 años de edad reside en casa propia junto a sus hijos. Él se dedica a  la prestación de servicios de una empresa de banquetes, de esta forma se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Con el fin de mejorar sus condiciones habitacionales solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la construcción de las paredes de la vivienda y el techo de la misma ya que se encuentran deterioradas y no es muy seguro. Con el monto solicitado comprará cemento, arena, estructuras metálicas para enrejar, ladrillo y lámina galvanizada.
texts.en:
Douglas, who is 36 years old, lives with his children in the home he owns. He works providing services for a banqueting company, which is how he makes a living and provides for his family. 

In order to improve his living conditions, he is requesting this loan from FUSAI so that he can invest in rebuilding the walls and roof of his house, which are in disrepair and not very safe. He will use the requested amount to buy cement, sand, wrought iron, bricks, and sheet metal.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, wrought iron, bricks, and sheet metal to repair the roof and walls of his home.

loans.name: Alba Elizabeth

texts.es: Alba de 39 años de edad vive en casa alquilada con su hija y su esposo que trabaja como motorista, ella posee un chalet cerca de su lugar de residencia donde vende golosinas, dulces, refrescos, gaseosas, jugos, etc. desde hace 2 años, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas y con la ayuda de su esposo logran solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Alba esta solicitando un credito para comprar mas mercadería por mayor y asi poder surtir su negocio que le genera buenas ganancias y poderle dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Alba, who is 39 years old, lives in the home she rents with her husband and daughter. Her husband works as a driver and she has a food stand near their home, where she sells snacks, sweets, soft drinks, sodas, juice, etc. She has been in business for two years and the profit she makes from her sales, along with her husband's help, allows them to cover some of their household expenses.

Alba is requesting a loan in order to purchase more wholesale merchandise so that she can have her business well stocked and it generates good profits, which in turn will allow her to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy wholesale snacks, sweets, soft drinks, sodas, juice, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sand, bricks, cement, iron, paint, etc.

loans.name: Irma Esperanza

texts.es: Irma de 41 años de edad es madre soltera vive en casa propia con sus tres hijos, el mayor de ellos le ayuda económicamente. Ella posee una venta de ropa tiene de diferentes estilos y  para todas las personas damas, caballeros, niños y niñas, la ropa que comercia es de muy buena calidad y la vende a precios accesibles es por eso que se ha hecho de mucha clientela últimamente; Irma es muy activa siempre se encuentra trabajando luchando por salir adelante. Para ella el propósito y coraje que le pone a su labor tiene una dirección ver crecer el negocio para lograr un mejor futuro, es por eso que se decidió solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar ropa en variedad como faldas, pantalones, blusas, camisetas, trajes etc. Así siempre podrá satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes. ella tiene la esperanza que de esta forma lograra darle a su familia seguridad económica y una vida plena.
texts.en:
Irma, who is 41 years old, is a single mother of three children, the oldest of which helps her out financially. She works selling different styles of clothing for everyone: men, women, boys, and girls. The clothing she sells is very good quality and she sells it at affordable prices, which is why she has attracted a lot of customers lately. 

Irma is very active and is always working and fighting to get ahead. She puts purpose and passion into her work in order to see her business grow so that she can achieve a better future. That is why she decided to request a loan from Integral, which will allow her to purchase a variety of clothing items like skirts, pants, blouses, t-shirts, suits, etc.  This will enable her to meet all her customers' needs. She is hopeful that this way she will manage to give her family financial security and a full life.

loans.use: to buy skirts, pants, blouses, t-shirts, suits, etc.

loans.name: Jose Armando

texts.es: José de 34 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su compañera de vida y sus cuatro hijas de 17 años, 14 años, 20 años y 2 años de edad. José se dedica a la venta de mariscos de forma ambulante desde hace 18 años. Trabaja muy duro para llevar el sustento a sus hijos y mantener la economía del hogar. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento, arena y grava para encementar el piso de la vivienda.
texts.en:
José is 34 years old and lives in his own house with his life partner and their four daughters aged 17, 14, 20 and 2.  For the last 18 years José has made a living as a street trader selling shellfish. He works very hard to provide for his children and support the household finances. 

José is asking FUSAI for this loan to buy cement, sand and gravel in order to put down a concrete floor in his home.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand and gravel to put down a concrete floor in his home.

loans.name: Luis

texts.es: Luis de 47 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus cinco hijos, el posee un taller de estructuras metálicas ubicado en su lugar de residencia, posee mucha clientela porque su trabajo es de calidad y a buen precio, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar algunos gatos de su hogar, el desea mejorar su vivienda colocando el techo y terminar de construir unos cuartos para sus hijos, pero con lo que obtiene de su trabajo no le alcanza para poder realizar dicho trabajo por esa razon solicita un credito para la compra de los materiales  necesarios como: cemento, ladrillos, duralitas, pintura, hierro, erena, etc. y asi poder vivir junto con su familia mas cómodos y seguros.
texts.en:
Luis is 47 years old and lives in his own house with his wife and their five children. He has a metal workshop in his home and has a lot of customers since his work is of a high quality and a good price. He is able to cover some of the household costs with what he earns. 

Luis wants to improve his home by fixing the roof and finishing the construction of some rooms for his children, but he does not earn enough from his work to be able to cover the cost of this work. This is why he is asking for a loan to buy the necessary materials such as cement, bricks, fibre roofing sheets, paint, iron, sand etc. so he and his family can all live comfortably and securely together.

loans.use: to buy materials such as cement, bricks, fibre roofing sheets, paint, iron, sand etc.

loans.name: Sonia Isabel

texts.es: Sonia de 37 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su compañera de vida y sus dos hijos de 18 años y 15 años de edad. Sonia se dedica a la prestación de servicios domésticos y habita en condiciones muy humildes junto a su grupo familiar. Sonia  solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, madera, arena, cemento, arena y grava para mejorar las paredes de la cocina y para encementar el piso de la vivienda el cual actualmente es de tierra.
texts.en:
Sonia is 37 years old and lives in her own house with her life partner and their two children aged 18 and 15. Sonia works as a domestic help and lives in very basic conditions with her family group.

Sonia is asking for this loan from FUSAI to buy galvanised laminated sheets, wood, sand, cement and gravel to repair the kitchen walls and to put down a concrete floor in the house, which currently has an earth floor.

loans.use: to buy galvanised laminated sheets, wood, sand, cement and gravel to repair the kitchen walls and to put down a concrete floor in the house.

loans.name: Humberto Nehemias

texts.es: Humberto vive junto a su compañera de vida y su hijo de 1 año de edad en casa propia ; el posee una venta de chocobananos y pinchos helados de diferentes frutas, tiene varios años de dedicarse al negocio y eso le ha regalado experiencia en las ventas, comercia de forma ambulante en un carretón y posee mucha clientela ya que es un producto muy vendible, Humberto quiere hacer crecer su negocio pero no posee de suficiente capital para invertir en insumos por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL  un crédito que le permita comprar banano, frutas, chocolate etc. Humberto tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda, y a la vez darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Humberto lives with his life partner and their one-year-old son in their own house. He has a business selling “chocobananos” [frozen chocolate-covered bananas] and frozen skewers of various fruits. He has been in this business for several years and this has given him sales experience. He sells on the streets from a small cart and has a lot of customers as it is a very marketable product.

Humberto wants to make his business grow but he does not have sufficient capital to invest in supplies so he is asking INTEGRAL for a loan which will enable him to buy bananas, fruit, chocolate etc. Humberto has good payment references and is very responsible. He gives assurances that he will be able to pay off the loan, while at the same time giving his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy bananas, fruit, chocolate etc.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: María de 52 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su compañera de vida y su pequeño nieto de 2 años de edad. María se dedica al comercio de tienda la cual ha logrado establecer en su hogar de habitación y de esta forma se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Es muy trabajadora y responsable por lo que sus vecinos dan muy buenas referencias. María desea invertir en su tienda con el fin de satisfacer una mayor demanda y así poder mejorar sus ventas y sus ingresos. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de mercadería como: huevos, aceite, cereales, golosinas, detergente, papel higiénico, etc.
texts.en: María, 52, lives in her own house with her common-law husband and a two-year-old grandson.  She runs a store out of her home in order to earn a living to support the household.  She is a hard worker and very responsible so her neighbors giver her very good references.  María wants to invest in her store so she can meet the growing demand and increase her sales and income.  To do so, she is requesting a loan through FUSAI to buy goods such as eggs, oil, cereals, sweets, detergent, toilet paper, etc.

loans.use: To buy eggs, oil, cereals, sweets, detergent, toilet paper, etc.

loans.name: Marcos Antonio

texts.es: Marcos de 41 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposa quien se dedica a los oficios domésticos de su casa. Marcos es un hombre trabajador quien se gana la vida por medio de la venta de leche de forma ambulante. Con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado comprar ganado en especial vacas para ganarse la vida de esta forma. Tiene 10 años de de trabajar como ganadero y dedicarse a la venta de leche por lo que ya cuenta con mucha experiencia. Desea invertir en la compra de nuevos terneros por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para hacer la compra de los animales y así hacer crecer su negocio.
texts.en: Marcos, 41, lives in his own house with his wife who is a homemaker.  Marcos is a hard worker who earns a living as a street vendor selling milk.  Through much effort he was able to buy the livestock, especially cows, he now has.  He has been working as a livestock farmer and selling milk for ten years, so he has considerable experience.  In order to buy new calves he is requesting a loan through FUSAI to buy livestock and grow his business.

loans.use: To buy cattle.

loans.name: Ana Nohemy

texts.es: Ana de 39 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y su hija, ella se dedica a la venta de dulces típicos como: de coco, de tamarindo, de leche, de nances, maní dulce y salado, etc. desde hace varios años, comercializa de forma ambulante por las diferentes colonias que se encuentran cerca de su lugar de residencia, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo y con la ayuda de su esposo logran solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Ana esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas dulces por mayor para seguir con su trabajo y así obtener mejores ganancias para darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Ana, 39, lives in her own house with her husband and daughter.  For several years, she has been selling typical sweets such as coconut, tamarind, caramel, nance, sweet and salty peanuts, etc.  She works as a street vendor in different communities near her place of residence.  The income she earns is to help her husband cover household expenses.  Ana is requesting a loan to buy more sweets, wholesale, to continue her business and make more profit so her family can have a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy sweets, wholesale.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: el cliente de 25 años de edad, se dedica a la venta de ropa, accesorios, cosméticos, carteras, zapatos, etc. su  negocio lo tiene ubicado en el mercado que se encuentra cerca de su lugar de residencia, posee mucha clientela por la variedad de productos que comercializa y por los buenos precios, con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas ayuda en su hogar en los gastos que se le presentan, el cliente desea comprar mas mercadería para surtir mas su negocio pero con lo que obtiene de sus ventas no le alcanza para poder realizarlo por eso solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito para poder comprar pantalones para hombres y mujeres, camisas, camisetas, blusas, licras, cosméticos, carteras, zapatos, etc. todo por mayor y así poder obtener mejores ganancias para seguir ayudando a su familia.
texts.en:
This borrower is 25 years old and makes a living selling clothing, accessories, handbags, shoes etc. His business is located in the market near his home. He has a lot of customers because of the range of products he sells and his good prices. He uses the profits he makes to help with the household costs which arise. 

The borrower wants to buy more merchandise in order to stock his business better. He isn't able to do this with the money he makes from his sales so he is asking INTEGRAL for a loan so he can buy trousers for men and women, shirts, blouses, Lycra clothing, cosmetics, handbags, shoes etc., all wholesale, so he can make better profits and continue to help his family.

loans.use: to buy trousers for men and women, shirts, blouses, Lycra clothing, cosmetics, handbags, shoes etc., all wholesale.

loans.name: Vicenta De Jesus

texts.es: Vicenta de 32 años de edad vive en casa de un familiar ella se dedica a la venta de todo tipo de productos de uso personal como lociones, desodorantes, perfumes, cremas, etc. su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas y con la ayuda de su esposo logran solventar los gastos de su hogar vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus hijos, la clienta desea acrecentar su negocio por eso solicta un crédito que le permita poder comprar todo lo necesario como: perfumes, desodorantes, lociones, cremas, etc. ya que tiene mucha clientela por dar sus productos a precios accesibles con la ayuda solictada ella podra obtener mejores ganancias y asi seguira dandole a su familia lo que necesita sin limitacion alguna
texts.en:
Vicenta is 32 years old and lives in a house belonging to a relative. She makes a living selling all kinds of personal care products such as lotions, deodorants, perfumes, creams etc. She has her business in her home and with the profits she makes from her sales and the help of her husband they manage to cover the household expenses. She lives in her own house with her husband and their children. 

Vicenta wants to increase her business and so she is asking for a loan which will enable her to buy everything she needs such as perfumes, deodorants, lotions, creams etc. She has a lot of customers as she sells her products at affordable prices. With the help she is asking for, she will be able to obtain better profits and continue to provide everything her family needs without any restrictions.

loans.use: to buy perfumes, deodorants, lotions, creams etc.

loans.name: Ana Guadalupe

texts.es: Ana de 36 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a sus hijos. Ana posee una pequeña tienda en su hogar de residencia, además, hace y vende pupusas (preparación alimenticia a base de masa de maíz, frijoles, queso, etc.). Es una mujer emprendedora quien hace todo lo que este a su alcance para dar mejores condiciones de vida a su familia. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de mayor inventario para la tienda como: cereales, aceite, golosinas, detergente, etc. y para invertir en la compra de los insumos necesarios para la elaboración de las ricas pupusas.
texts.en: Ana is 36 years old and lives in her own house with her children. Ana has a small shop in her home and also sells "pupusas" (a corn-tortilla stuffed with beans, cheese and other foods). Ana is an enterprising woman who does everything that she can in order to give her family a better life. Ana is applying for this loan in order to invest in more stock for her store. She will buy cereals, oil, sweets, detergent and more for the store, and will invest in the necessary supplies for making her delicious "pupusas".

loans.use: to buy cereals, oil, sweets, detergent, tomatoes, cheese, cabbage and more.

loans.name: Reyes De Los Santos

texts.es: Reyes de 54 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a sus hijos. Reyes es una mujer trabajadora quien hace todo lo que este en sus manos para llevar el sustento a su hogar. Ella se gana la vida por medio de la venta de pupusas (preparación alimenticia a base de masa de maíz, queso y frijoles.) las cuales son muy demandadas por sus clientes. Desea invertir en su negocio de pupusas por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de materiales como: maíz, queso, frijoles, tomates, repollo, etc. para preparar las deliciosas pupusas.
texts.en: Reyes, 54, lives in her own house with her children.  She is a hard worker who does everything she can to provide for her household.  Reyes earns a living selling "pupusas" (tortillas stuffed with cheese and beans) which are very popular among her customers.  She wants to invest in her business and is requesting a loan through FUSAI to buy ingredients such as corn, cheese, beans, tomatoes, cabbage, etc. to make her delicious pupusas.

loans.use: To buy corn, cheese, beans, tomatoes, cabbage, etc.

loans.name: Ana Silvia

texts.es: Ana 38 años de edad vive junto a su hija, ella es una mujer muy responsable quien siempre está en miras de mejorar su estabilidad económica. Ella trabaja en su propia panadería en la que elabora pan francés, el cual elabora ella sola a primeras horas de la madrugada para poder venderlo antes del desayuno, que es cuando las personas más lo consumen al igual que en la cena. Ella solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, para contar con la ayuda necesaria para invertir en la compra de harina, levadura, manteca, latas y todo lo necesario para poder producir más. Este proyecto de mejoramiento para su panadería es muy importante para ella puesto que así mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en: Ana is 38 years old and lives with her daughter. Ana is a very responsible woman and is always looking out for ways to improve her financial stability. She works in her own bread shop, where she makes rolls. She works on her own from very early in the morning, in order to sell her product before breakfast, the time, along with dinner, when people most consume her products. Ana is applying for a loan from INTEGRAL in order to have the necessary help to invest in flour, yeast, butter, dough and other items necessary to produce more bread. This project to improve her bread shop is very important for Ana as it will allow her to improve her family's and her own quality of life.

loans.use: to buy flour, yeast, butter, dough and more.

loans.name: Aminta Noemy

texts.es: Aminta de 37 años de edad vive en casa propia su esposo y sus hijos, es muy conocida en la zona donde reside por su humildad y su entrega al trabajo, nunca se ha dejado vencer y siempre ha salido adelante con sus dificultades. Con esfuerzo y dedicación posee una tienda en la que vende productos de primera necesidad granos básicos, leche, huevos, arroz, golosinas, pan, entre otros, es muy dedicada a su labor y muy servicial a la hora de vender, es por eso que posee clientes que la buscan y la prefieren por sus productos. Se ha visto en la necesidad de surtir un poco mas la tienda debido al aumento de demanda y pero no tiene el capital para realizarlo, es por eso que la clienta solicita un crédito para comprar más productos como granos básicos, producto instantáneo, golosinas, bebidas, etc. Confía en Dios de que pronto la ayuda solicitada, será otorgada, y no tendrá más preocupación que llevar el sustento diario a su hogar.
texts.en:
Aminta, 37, lives in her own house with her husband and children.  She is very well known in the area for her humbleness and dedication to work, never giving up and always overcoming her difficulties.  With effort and dedication she runs a store where she sells essential items such as basic grains, milk, eggs, rice, sweets, bread, etc.  She works hard and provides good customer service, so they prefer shopping at her store.  

Because of the increase in demand she needs to stock more products at her store but does not have the capital to do so.  So she is requesting a loan to buy more goods such as basic grains, instant products, sweets, beverages, etc.  She has faith that she will receive the loan soon and not have to worry about being able to provide for her family.

loans.use: To buy basic grains, instant products, sweets, beverages, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy packs of clothing, cosmetics, etc.

loans.name: Oscar Eliseo

texts.es: Oscar de 29 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su madre y hermanos. Oscar se gama la vida trabajando como empleado en una institución cercana de su localidad. De esta forma se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Oscar posee un pequeño taller de mecánica en su hogar de residencia el cual desea mejorar la galera donde lo tiene ya que se encuentra en mal estado. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir ne la compra de ladrillo, arena, cemento y lámina galvanizada.
texts.en: Oscar is 29 years old and lives in his privately owned house with his mother and siblings. Oscar earns a living working for a local institution. He earns a wage there and is able to support his household. Oscar also has a small mechanic's workshop in his home. He wants to renovate the workshop as it is currently in a bad condition. In order to carry out this renovation work, Oscar is applying for a loan from FUSAI in order to buy bricks, sand, cement and galvanized metal sheeting.

loans.use: to buy bricks, sand, cement, galvanized metal sheeting to repair his workshop.

loans.name: Maria  Alicia

texts.es: Doña Maria vive en casa propia junto con su esposo, ella se dedica a la venta de joyería de enchape lo hace de forma ambulante por las diferentes colonias que se encuentran cerca de su lugar de residencia, posee mucha clientela por que su producto es de buena calidad y a precios accesibles, con lo que obtiene de sus ganancias logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Doña Maria esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas mercadería como: anillos, cadenas, pulseras, aritos, etc. todo de enchape por mayor ya que esa es su unica fuente d trabajo y asi tener una mejor calidad de vida junto con su esposo.
texts.en: María lives in a house that she owns alongside her husband. She works selling gold-plated jewellery and a street vendor in the different areas near her home. María has many customers because her products are good quality and sold at affordable prices. With her profits, María is able to cover some household costs. María is applying for a new loan in order to buy more merchandise. She will buy gold-plated rings, chains, bracelets and more in bulk. This is her only job and this loan will help María to enjoy a better quality of life with her husband.

loans.use: to buy gold-plated rings, chains, bracelets and more in bulk.

loans.name: Ana Rubia

texts.es: Ana de 26 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y su hijo de cuatro años de edad. Ana se dedica al cultivo y venta de hortalizas desde hace tres años. Cultiva principalmente chiles, pipianes, pepinos, etc. De esta forma se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Desea invertir en el cultivo de las hortalizas para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de semillas y abonos para el negocio.
texts.en: Ana is 26 years old and lives in her own house with her partner and four-year-old son. Ana has been making a living growing and selling vegetables for three years. She grows mainly chillis, cucumbers, and other items. With this work Ana earns a living and supports her household. Ana wants to invest in her vegetable crops and so is applying for a loan from FUSAI in order to buy seeds and manure for her business.

loans.use: to buy seeds and manure for growing vegetables.

loans.name: Carmen Lisseth

texts.es: Carmen de 29 años de edad habita en casa familiar junto a sus padres y hermano.
