Carmen trabaja como empleada en una institución cercana a su localidad por lo que mensualmente percibe un salario que le permite llevar el sustento a su hogar. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para reparar la vivienda ya que con el tiempo el techo y los pilares se han dañado. Con el monto solicitado comprará lámina galvanizada, madera, clavos y pilares ademas pagará la mano de obra para las reparaciones.
texts.en: Carmen, 29, lives in her family's home with her parents and brother. Carmen works as a clerk in a company near to her home where she receives a monthly salary that allows her to support the household. She is applying for this loan from FUSAI to repair their home because the roof and pillars have been damaged over time. With the amount requested, she will buy galvanized steel, wood, nails, and pillars, and pay for laborers to make the repairs.

loans.use: to purchase galvanized steel, wood, nails, and pillars to repair her home.

loans.name: Noemi Marineli

texts.es: Noemí de 42 años de edad, vive con su compañero de vida y sus tres hijos, Noemí trabaja confeccionando todo tipo de ropa tiene mucha clientela que la prefieren porque confecciona sus prendas a buen precio. Ella es muy responsable y siempre entregan los pedidos a tiempo, lo que le ha ayudado a contar con muy buenas referencias y clientes. Noemí trabaja muy duro para sostener su hogar, y desea mejorar su negocio contando con mayor materia prima para elaborar más prendas de vestir. Es por esta razón que ella solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL y de este modo contar con el dinero necesario para invertir en su negocio comprando agujas, hilos, tela,etc. y asi obtener mejores ganancias para darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Noemí, 42, lives with her partner and their three children. Noemí works manufacturing all kinds of clothes. She has many customers who prefer to buy from her because she makes garments at a good price. She is very responsible and always delivers her orders on time, which has helped her to have very good recommendations and customers. Noemí works hard to maintain her home. She wants to improve her business by having increased raw material to make clothing. For this reason, she is requesting a loan from Apoyo Integral to have the capital to invest in her business for buying needles, thread, fabric, and more to obtain better profits and give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase needles, threads, fabric, and more to make clothing.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: el cliente de 20 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañera de vida, su madre y su hermana. El posee un taller de costura en el lugar de su residencia donde confecciona diferentes tipos de prendas, últimamente se ha hecho de mucha clientela porque el trabajo que el realiza es excelente y lo vende a precios realmente accesibles; él es un joven muy dedicado a su trabajo responsable y honesto, el cliente esta solicitando un crédito que le permita comprar: telas, hilos, agujas y todo lo relacionado con la costura para seguir satisfaciendo la necesidad de los clientes y asi el y su familia podrá tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: This borrower is 20 years old and lives in his own house with his partner, his mother and his sister. The borrower has a tailoring workshop in his home, where he produces all sorts of clothing items. He has recently gained many customers because he does excellent work and sells his products at very affordable prices. This young man is very dedicated, responsible and honest. He is applying for a loan in order to buy material, thread, needs and all sorts of items used in tailoring work. With these items, he can continue to satisfy his customers' needs and then he and his family can enjoy a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy material, threads, needles and more.

loans.name: Erick Edgardo

texts.es: Erick de 32 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su madre e hijo de ocho años de edad. Erick trabaja como motorista en transporte privado en su localidad. Es un hombre muy trabajador y responsable quien desea dar mejores condicione a su familia. Desea construir un muro de retención en su terreno para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, cemento, arena y hierro y así poder proceder a la construcción del muro lo antes posible.
texts.en: Erick, 32, lives in his own home with his mother and his eight-year-old son. Erick works as a private taxi driver locally. He is a hardworking and responsible man who wants to give his family better living conditions. He wants to build a retaining wall on his property. He has requested a loan from FUSAI to invest in the purchase of brick, cement, sand, and iron so he can proceed with the construction of the wall as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase brick, cement, sand, and iron to construct a retaining wall.

loans.name: Ruben Antonio

texts.es: Ruben de 45 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar conformado por su esposa y sus hijos, el se dedica a la carpintería elabora todo tipo de muebles y ataudes desde hace varios años, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar algunos gastos que se le presentan en su hogar, Ruben esta solicitando un credito para la compra de madera, clavos, barniz y otras herramientas que el utiliza, para seguir con su trabajo ya que esa es su unica fuente de ingresos y asi poderle dar a su familia una mejor calidad e vida.
texts.en: Ruben, 45, lives in his own home with his familial group which consists of his wife and children. He earns his living in woodworking. He has made all kinds of furniture and caskets for several years. What he earns at work is used to solve the economic problems in their home. Ruben is requesting a loan to purchase wood, nails, varnish, and other tools that he uses to continue his work. It is his family's only source of income to give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase wood, nails, varnish, and other tools.

loans.name: Zeneida Maribel

texts.es: Zeneida de 46 años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus dos hijos en casa propia, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa tiene varios años con el negocio y eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, el negocio esta ubicado en su lugar de residencia, se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues las personas saben que todo es de calidad, a precios accesibles y con un servicio inigualable siempre a la orden y al gusto de los clientes; quiere realizar una nueva inversión, pero no posee de suficiente capital que la respalde por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar ropa por mayor. Zeneida asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez tiene la esperanza que llevara a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en: Zeneida, 46, lives with her partner and their two children in their own home. She has been selling clothes for several years which has given her plenty of experience which allows her to earn more profits. The business is located in her home. She has done well with this business because people know that everything is of good quality at affordable prices with unsurpassed customer service. She wanted to make a new investment but did not have sufficient capital to support it so she requested a loan from Apoyo Integral that will allow her to buy wholesale clothing. Zeneida ensures that she will pay off her debt and provide for her household's economic security.

loans.use: to purchase wholesale clothing.

loans.name: Teresa De Jesus

texts.es: Teresa vive en casa propia con sus hijos y su esposo, ella se dedica a la venta de todo tipo de articulos de primera necesidad como: granos básicos, huevos,jugos gaseosas, papel higiénico, detergentes, jabón, etc. su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia desde hace vario años posee mucha clientela porque siempre tiene lo que buscan, con las ganancias que obtiene y con la ayuda de su esposo logran solventar algunos gastos del hogar, Teresa esta solicitando un crédito para a compra de mas mercadería por mayor para poder seguir con su negocio que es su única fuente de trabajo y así poderle dar a su familia lo que necesitan sin limitación alguna.
texts.en: Teresa lives in her own home with her children and her husband. She sells all kinds of staple items such as grains, eggs, soda, juice, toilet paper, detergent, and soap. Her business is located in her home and was established several years ago. She has a lot of customers because she always has what they want. The income she earns is used to cover household expenses which she shares with her husband. Teresa is requesting a loan to buy wholesale merchandise to continue with her business as it is her only source of work. She would like to give her family what they need without any limitations.

loans.use: to purchase wholesale items for her shop.

loans.name: Julio Cesar

texts.es: julio vive en casa propia con su familia conformada por sus dos hijos y su esposa, el posee una tienda en su lugar de residencia tiene muchos años con su negocio y eso le ha regalado experiencia en las ventas que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, es muy reconocido por los vecinos de la zona, se ha hecho de mucha clientela, pues tiene la tienda surtida, el quiere acrecentar el negocio y realizar una nueva inversión pero necesita de capital por eso solicita un crédito que le permita comprar lo necesario para su tienda como golosinas, granos basicos, aceite, arroz, azucar, refrescos, etc. asegura que cancelara la deuda y a la vez confía en que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida
texts.en:
Julio lives in his own house with his family which is composed of two children and his wife. He has a store in his home. He has years of experience in this business so he knows the products that yield the greatest profits. He is well-known by his neighbors in the area. He has made a lot of clients as his store is well-stocked. 

Julio wants to expand his business and make another investment but he doesn't have enough capital. So he is requesting a loan which will allow him to buy what his store needs like candy, basic grains, oil, rice, sugar, soft drinks, etc. He assures us that he will pay off his loan and at the same time is confident that he can provide his family with a higher quality of living.

loans.use: to buy candy, basic grains, oil, rice, sugar, soft drinks, etc.

loans.name: Yessica Cecilia

texts.es: Yessica de 21 años de edad, es una joven muy trabajadora que desde hace dos años se dedica a la venta de frutas en el mercado de su localidad. Ella desea ayudar a su familia y mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda; por lo que ha solicitado a FUSAI un crédito para comprar bloque de concreto, cemento, arena, grava y otros materiales para la construcción de paredes de una nueva habitación. Ella espera saldar su deuda y seguir siendo sujeta de créditos y lograr hacer otras mejoras futuras a su vivienda.
texts.en: Yessica is 21 years old. She is a hard-working young woman who for the past two years has been selling fruit in the local market.She wants to help her family and improve their living conditions. So she has requested a loan from FUSAI to buy cement blocks, cement, sand, gravel and other materials to build the walls of a new room. She expects to pay off her loan and continue taking loans in the future, to make other improvements to her home.

loans.use: to buy construction materials to build another room on her house.

loans.name: Maria Cleofes

texts.es: María de 27 años de edad tiene tres hijos menores de edad y vive junto a su compañero de vida en casa propia. María y su esposo están haciendo todo el esfuerzo posible para que sus hijos tengan un ambiente mejor a la de ellos por lo que desde hace años vienen construyendo su casa; es por ello que María ha solicitado un crédito a FUSAI para ampliar su vivienda y construir el espacio de cocina. Con el dinero compraría los bloques de concreto, arena, grava, hierro y otros materiales necesarios para dicha construcción.
texts.en: María is 27 years old and has three minor children. She lives with her life companion in their own home.  María and her husband are making every effort so that the children have a better environment that what they had. They have been building their house for years. So  María has requested a loan from FUSAI to expand their house by building a kitchen space. She will buy concrete blocks, sand, gravel, re-bar and other materials needed for this construction.

loans.use: to buy concrete blocks, sand, gravel, re-bar and other materials for building their kitchen.

loans.name: Blanca Alicia

texts.es: Blanca de 37 años de edad se dedica a la venta de ropa interior para damas y caballeros, desde hace 6 años ejerce este oficio y cuenta con muchos clientes fijos con lo que puede mantener su negocio a flote, con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas logar cubrir algunos gastos de su hogar, ella vive con su esposo y sus tres hijos,  Blanca solicita un préstamo a través del cual pueda comprar mayor cantidad de ropa interior ya que posee gran demanda por parte de muchas personas, con lo que podrá adquirir en diferentes precios, estilos y colores y de esta forma contar con más clientes y así mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en: Blanca is 37 years old and she sells man's and woman's underwear. She has been doing this business for 6 years and she has many steady clients who keep her business afloat. With what she makes from her sales she manages to pay some of the household expenses. She lives with her husband and her three children. Blanca is requesting a loan which which to buy a greater quantity of underwear. She has a lot of orders from customers. She can buy different price ranges, styles, colors and in this way gain more clients and thus improve the quality of living of her family.

loans.use: to buy man's and woman's underwear.

loans.name: Mariano

texts.es: Mariano de 65 años de edad vive solo en casa propia, que con su propio esfuerzo fue construyendo. Mariano es empleado y comerciante de flores. Mariano se acercó a FUSAI para solicitar un crédito ya que necesita reparar el techo de su vivienda. Con el dinero comprará la lámina galvanizada, madera para la estructura del techo y pagará la mano de obra. Él es una persona muy conocida y todas las personas dan muy buena referencia.
texts.en: Mariano is 65 years old. He lives alone in his own home which he built by himself. Mariano is an employee and a seller of flowers. Mariano has come to FUSAI to request a loan as he needs to repair the roof of his house. He will buy galvanized sheeting, wood for the structure if the roof and pay for labor with the money. He is a well-known person and everyone would give him a good reference.

loans.use: to buy laminated sheeting, nails, wood and pay for labor to repair the roof of his house.

loans.name: Omar Antonio

texts.es: Omar es un joven de 25 años de edad quien está acompañado y tienen un hijo.  Su esposa colabora con él en el quehacer del hogar y cuido de su hijo, Omar trabaja como empleado de una empresa embotelladoras de agua desde hace dos años y con su salario a podido mantener a su familia. Omar desea levantar unas paredes de su vivienda y hacer un cuarto más a su vivienda. Por esa razón a solicitado un crédito a FUSAI y comprar cemento, arena, grava, ladrillo de barrio y otros necesarios para la construcción del cuarto de habitación.
texts.en:
Omar is a 25 year old young man.  He is in a relationship, and they have a son.  His wife helps him with the household tasks and in taking care of their son.  Omar has worked as an employee of a water bottling company for two years.  He has been able to support his family with his salary.

Omar wishes to raise some walls to his house and to make another room in his house.  That is the reason that he has requested a loan from FUSAI.  He will use the loan to buy cement, sand, gravel, bricks, and other necessities in order to build a room in his house.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, gravel, bricks and other necessities in order to build a room in his house.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: el cliente de 20 años de edad vive con su compañera de vida y su hijo de un año de edad en casa propia, es un joven muy responsable, trabajador y honrado, trabaja en su propia panadería en la que elabora pan dulce y pan frances, y sale a venderlo por la colonia donde el reside solicita un préstamo para invertir en la compra de harina, manteca, latas y todo lo necesario para poder producir más. Este proyecto de mejoramiento para su panadería es muy importante para el puesto que así mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
The client, age 20, lives in his own house with his life partner and their one year old son.  He is a very responsible, hard-working, and honest young man.  He works in his own bakery, where he makes sweet breads and French breads.  He goes out to sell the bread in the neighborhood where he lives.

He is requesting a loan in order to buy flour, shortening, tins, and everything he needs in order to produce more.  This improvement project for his bakery is very important to him because it is in this way that he will improve his family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy flour, shortening, tins, and everything he needs in order to produce more.

loans.name: Xiomara Elizabeth

texts.es: Xiomara vive en casa porpia con su madre, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa interior para damas y caballeros dedes hace varios años su negocio lo tiene ubicado en el mercado que se encuentra cerca de su lugar de residencia, posee mucha clientela fija que la buscan por que sus productos son de calidad y a buenos precios, con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas logar cubrir algunos gastos de su hogar, ella solicita un préstamo a través del cual pueda comprar mayor cantidad de ropa interior con lo que podrá adquirir en diferentes precios, estilos y colores y de esta forma contar con más clientes y así mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su madre.
texts.en:
Xiomara lives in her own house with her mother.  Xiomara has been selling women’s and men’s underwear for several years.  Her business is located at the market that is close to where she lives.  She has a lot of customers.  They seek her out because her products are quality, and she has good prices.  With the income that she gets from her sales, she manages to cover some of the household expenses.

She is requesting a loan with which she will be able to buy a greater quantity of underwear.  She will get different prices, styles, and colors.  This way she will have more customers, and she will improve her quality of life and that of her mother.

loans.use: to buy women's and men's underwear.

loans.name: Norma Yaneth

texts.es: Norma ella posee un vivero en su lugar de residencia vende todo tipo de plantas desde hace varios años y posee clientela ya establecida que la buscan por los buenos precios, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas y con la ayuda de su esposo logra salir adelante con los gastos que se les presentan en su hogar, vive en casa propia con sus dos hijos y su esposo, Norma esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de hierro y alambre para elaborar canastas para poner las plantas así como las muestra en la fotografía y seguir con su negocio que le genera buenas ganancias para darle a su familia lo que necesitan sin limitación alguna.
texts.en:
Norma has had a nursery at her house for several years.  She sells all types of plants, and she has an established clientele who seek her out for the good prices.  With what she gets from her sales, and with her husband’s help, she manages to get ahead with the household expenses.  She lives in her own house with her two children and her husband.  

Norma is requesting a loan to buy iron and wire in order to make baskets in which to put the plants.  In this way, as seen in the photograph, she will continue with her business that generates good profits for her.  She does this in order to give her family what they need without any limitations.

loans.use: to buy iron and wire.

loans.name: Juan Francisco

texts.es: juan vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus dos hijos, el se dedica al cultivo de caña de azúcar, de hortalizas y tomates desde hace varios años, adicional a eso se dedica a la elaboración de dulce de panela, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra sacar adelante a su familia, Juan esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de abono para la caña de azúcar y una tomatera, también para darle mantenimiento a la molienda donde hace el dulce que es el que muestra la fotografía, asi obtener mejores ganancias y darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Juan lives in his own house with his wife and their two children.  He has been growing sugarcane, vegetables, and tomatoes for several years.  In addition to this, he makes ‘dulce de panela’ [unrefined brown sugar wrapped in sugarcane leaves].  With what he gets from his work he manages to get his family ahead. 

Juan is requesting a loan to buy fertilizer for the sugarcane and tomato plants.  He will also use the loan to perform maintenance on the grinder where he makes the sweets, which is shown in the photograph.  This way he will get better income and give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for the sugarcane and tomato plants and to perform maintenance on the grinder.

loans.name: Maria Magdalena

texts.es: María de 68 años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida quien se dedica hacer viajes y su madre en casa propia; ella se dedica a la venta de pupusas desde hace varios años su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia, se ha hecho de experiencia muy valiosa que le permite elaborar las mejores pupusas y asi obtener las mejores ganancias, en las ultimas semanas aumentaron las ventas, a decidió aumentar la producción pero necesita de capital para sus compras por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz, quesillo, chicharrón, verduras, frijoles, etc. María tiene buenas referencias de pago, es muy responsable y agradece el apoyo, asegura que saldara la deuda y a la vez le dará a su familia una vida mejor.
texts.en:
Maria, age 68, lives with her life partner, whose business activity is travel, and her mother in her own house.  She has been selling ‘pupusas’ [stuffed tortillas] for several years.  Her business is located at her house.  This has given her very valuable experience that allows her to make the best pupusas.  This way she gets the best profits.  In the past weeks her sales have increased.  

She has decided to increase the production, but she needs capital to make her purchases.  That is why she is requesting a loan from Integral.  The loan will allow her to buy corn, soft cheese, fried pork rinds, vegetables, and beans, etc.  Maria has good payment references, and she is very responsible.  She is grateful for the support.  She is certain she will repay the debt and, at the same time, give her family a better life.

loans.use: to buy corn, soft cheese, fried pork rinds, vegetables, and beans, etc

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: la clienta de 24 años de edad vive en casa propia con su familia es muy conocida en la zona donde reside por su humildad y su entrega al trabajo, nunca se ha dejado vencer y siempre ha salido adelante con sus dificultades. Con esfuerzo y dedicación posee una tienda en la que vende productos de primera necesidad granos básicos, leche, huevos, arroz, golosinas, refrescos, entre otros, es muy dedicada a su labor y muy servicial a la hora de vender, es por eso que posee clientes que la buscan y la prefieren por sus productos. Se ha visto en la necesidad de surtir un poco mas la tienda debido al aumento de demanda y no tiene el capital para realizarlo, es por eso que la clienta solicita un crédito para comprar más productos como granos básicos, producto instantáneo, golosinas, bebidas, etc. Confía en Dios de que pronto la ayuda solicitada, será otorgada, y no tendrá más preocupación que llevar el sustento diario a su hogar.
texts.en:
The client, age 24, lives in her own house with her family.  In the area where she lives she is very well-known for her humility and devotion to her work.  She has never given up, and she always has gotten ahead with her difficulties.  With effort and dedication, she has a store where she sells basic needs products like basic grains, milk, eggs, rice, candy, and soft drinks, among others.  She is very dedicated to her work and very obliging when it comes time to sell.  That is why she has customers who seek her out and prefer her for her products.

She has seen the need to stock her store a little more due to the increase in the demand.  She does not have the capital to do so.  That is why the client is requesting a loan to buy more products like basic grains, instant products, candy, and drinks, etc.  She has faith in God that the requested help will be provided and that she will have no other worries than bringing home the daily bread.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, instant products, candy, and drinks, etc.

loans.name: Maria Mercedes

texts.es: Maria vive con su esposo y sus 2 hijos en casa propia, ella posee una tienda donde vende artículos de primera necesidad como granos básicos, detergentes, cafe, azucar, golosinas, refrescos, etc. su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia y eso le permite obtener mejores ganancias, quiere acrecentar el negocio y realizar una nueva inversión pero necesita de capital para poder realizarlo, por eso solicita un crédito que le permita comprar todo lo necesario para surtir su negocio y asi obtener mejores ganancias y poderle dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida
texts.en:
Maria lives with her husband and their two children in her own house.  She has a store where she sells basic needs items like basic grains, detergent, coffee, sugar, candy, and soft drinks, etc.  Her business is located at her house.  This allows her to get better profits.

She wants to expand the business and make a new investment.  However, she needs capital in order to be able to do so.  That is why she is requesting a loan that will allow her to buy all that she needs to stock her business.  This way she will get better earnings and be able to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, detergent, coffee, sugar, candy, and soft drinks, etc.

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es: Francisco vive en casa propia con sus padres, el se dedica a la agricultura siembra maíz y frijol y adicional a esto siembra hortalizas, tomates, chiles y ayote, tiene mas de 20 años de trabajar en la agricultura y ha ganado experiencia valiosa que le permite obtener las mejores cosechas, comercia en todos los alrededores de la comunidad y se ha hecho de mucha clientela que lo prefieren porque todo lo que vende es de primera calidad, a precios accesibles y con un buen servicio; francisco solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla, abono, insecticida, fertilizantes, controles de plagas, herramientas, etc. para obtener mejores cosechas y asi tener una mejor estabilidad económica junto con sus padres.
texts.en:
Francisco lives with his parents in his own house. He works in agriculture growing corn and beans and also vegetables like tomatoes, chilies and squash. He has been working in agriculture for more than 20 years and has gained valuable experience that makes it possible for him to obtain the best crops.  He sells in all of the areas surrounding his community.  He has gotten a lot of customers who prefer him because everything that he sells is the best quality with affordable prices and good service.

Francisco is requesting a loan from Integral that will allow him to buy seeds, manure, insecticide, fertilizer, pest control, and tools, etc.   He will do this in order to obtain better crops so that he and his parents can have better economic stability.

loans.use: to buy seeds, manure, insecticide, fertilizer, pest control, and tools, etc.

loans.name: Rosa Gladis

texts.es: Rosa de 40 años de edad se dedica a la venta de todo tipo de productos de uso personal como lociones, desodorantes, perfumes, cremas, etc. su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia desde hace varios años, con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas y con la ayuda de su esposo logran solventar los gastos de su hogar, vive en casa propia con su esposo y su hijo, la clienta desea acrecentar su negocio por eso solicta un credito que le permita poder comprar todo lo necesario como: perfumes, esmaltes para uñas, desodorantes, cremas, lociones, etc todo por mayor, ya que tiene mucha clientela por dar sus productos a precios accesibles con la ayuda solicitada ella podra obtener mejores ganancias y asi seguira dandole a su familia lo que necesita sin limitacion alguna
texts.en:
Rosa, age 40, sells all types of personal use products like lotions, deodorants, perfumes, and creams, etc.  She has had her business for several years, and it is located in her house.  With the income that she gets from her sales, and with the help of her husband, they manage to pay the household expenses.  She lives in her own house with her husband and her son.

Rosa wishes to expand her business.  That is why she is requesting a loan that will allow her to be able to buy everything needed like perfume, nail polish, deodorant, cream, and lotion, etc.  She will buy everything wholesale.  She has a lot of clientele because she sells her products at affordable prices.  With the requested help she will be able to get better income.  This way she will continue giving her family what it needs without any limitation.

loans.use: to buy lotions, deodorants, perfumes, and creams, etc.

loans.name: Melvin Eliezar

texts.es: Melvin de 30 años de edad vive con su grupo familiar conformado por sus dos hijos y su esposa, el se dedica a la venta de ajo, comercializa de forma ambulante por las diferentes colonias que se encuentran cerca de su lugar de residencia, con lo que obtiene de sus ganancias logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Melvin esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de ajos por mayor para poder seguir con su trabajo ya que esa es su única fuente de ingresos y así poderle dar a su familia lo que necesitan sin limitación alguna.
texts.en:
Melvin, age 30, lives with his family, which is comprised of his wife and their two children.  He sells garlic in an itinerant manner in the different neighborhoods that are close to his house.  With what he gets from his profits his manages to pay some of the household expenses.

Melvin is requesting a loan to buy garlic in bulk in order to be able to continue with his work.  This is his only source of income.  This way he will be able to give his family what they need without any limitation.

loans.use: to buy garlic in bulk.

loans.name: Alfonso Edgardo

texts.es: Alfonso de 34 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañera de vida quienes han procreado 2 hijos. Alfonso se está esforzando por finalizar la vivienda la que actualmente como se aprecia en la fotografía le hace falta instalar la estructura de techo y la cubierta de aproximadamente 70 metros cuadrado. Para hacerlo a solicitado un crédito a FUSAI y así comprar los materiales como lámina de acero revestida de aluminio y zinc, polin C de 4 pulgadas y demás accesorios para este trabajo. Alfonso se compromete a solventar la deuda que este crédito implica.
texts.en:
Alfonso, age 34, lives in his own house with his life partner and their two children.  Alfonso is putting forth great effort to finish his house.  As can be seen in the photograph, it needs the roof structure and the covering of approximately 70 square meters.

In order to do this he is requesting a loan from FUSAI.  He will use the loan to buy the materials like laminated metal sheeting covered in aluminum and zinc, four inch C beams, and other accessories for this job.  Alfonso pledges to repay this loan.

loans.use: to buy laminated metal sheeting covered in aluminum and zinc, four inch C beams, and other accessories for the roof of his house.

loans.name: Norma Isabel

texts.es: Norma de 39 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y sus pequeños hijos. Norma se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza, pan dulce y pollos. La venta la realiza de manera ambulante y de esta forma se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Desea construir un cuarto para la cocina y pavimentar la entrada principal de su vivienda para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, cemento, arena, hierro, grava y pago de mano de obra para construir el cuarto para la cocina y para pavimentar el piso de la entrada de la vivienda.
texts.en:
Norma, age 39, lives in her own house with her husband and their small children.  She sells beauty products, sweet bread, and chickens.  She sells in an itinerant manner.  This way she earns a living and supports her family.

She wishes to build a room for the kitchen and to pave the main entrance to her house.  That is why she is requesting this loan from FUSAI.  She will use the loan to buy bricks, cement, sand, iron, and gravel.  She will also pay for the labor to build the room for the kitchen and for paving the floor of the entrance to her house.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, sand, iron, and gravel and to pay for labor.

loans.name: Gregoria De Jesus

texts.es: Gregoria de 49 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y sus hijos. Ella se dedica a la prestación de servicios domésticos desde hace mucho tiempo y junto a su esposo quien es agricultor llevan la economía del hogar. Gregoria desea construir un cuarto dormitorio para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, cemento, arena, hierro y lámina galvanizada para construir el cuarto dormitorio.
texts.en:
Gregoria, age 49, lives in her own house with her husband and their children.  She has been providing domestic services for a long time.  Together with her husband, a farmer, they support their household.

Gregoria wishes to build a bedroom.  That is why she is requesting this loan from FUSAI.  She will buy bricks, cement, sand, iron, and galvanized metal sheeting in order to build the bedroom.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, sand, iron, and galvanized metal sheeting in order to build a bedroom.

loans.name: Ana Milagro

texts.es: Ana de 38 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposo e hijos y se dedica al comercio de tienda desde hace mucho tiempo. Junto a su esposo llevan la economía del hogar  y hacen todo lo que este a su alcance para dar a sus hijos mejores condiciones. Ana desea mejorar la entrada de su vivienda ya que cuando llueve se hace charco dificultando la entrada al hogar. Desea encementar esta parte de la entrada lo antes posible ya que cuando es invierno es muy difícil entrar. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento, arena, grava y pago de mano de obra.
texts.en:
Ana, age 38, lives in her own house with her husband and children.  Her business is a store, which she has had for a long time.  She and her husband support their household together.  They do everything they can to give their children the best conditions.

Ana wishes to improve the entrance to her house.  When it rains a puddle forms, and this makes it difficult to enter her home.  She wishes to expand this part of the entrance as soon as possible because it is very difficult to enter in the winter.  In order to do so, she is requesting this loan from FUSAI.  She will use the loan to buy cement, sand, and gravel and to pay for the labor.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, and gravel and to pay for the labor to expand the entrance to her house.

loans.name: Ana Yesica

texts.es: Ana vive en casa propia junto a su esposo y sus dos hijos, ella posee una tienda en la cual comercializa productos de primera necesidad como: pan, leche, huevos, alimentos enlatados, agua embotellada, verduras y otros productos más. Ella es una persona muy responsable y amable la cual cuenta con varios clientes a pesar que su tienda no tiene mucha variedad de productos. Ana solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda contar con el dinero necesario para comprar mayor cantidad de productos, ya que el mayor deseo de ella es el de poder surtir su negocio y así percibir mayores ganancias. Ella es una madre de familia muy responsable quien desea mucho poder brindarle todo lo mejor a su familia.
texts.en:
Ana lives in her own house with her husband and their two children.  She has a store where she sells basic needs products like bread, milk, eggs, canned goods, bottled water, vegetables, and other products.  She is a very responsible and kind person.  She has many customers even though her store does not have a big variety of products.

Ana is requesting a loan in order to be able to have the money needed to buy a greater quantity of products.  Her biggest wish is to be able to stock her business.  This way she will get greater income.  She is a very responsible mother who greatly wishes to be able to give her family all of the best.

loans.use: to buy bread, milk, eggs, canned goods, bottled water, vegetables, and other products.

loans.name: Milagro Del Carmen

texts.es: Milagro de 35 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su grupo familiar. Milagro se gana la vida por medio de la venta de variedad de verduras las cuales vende de manera ambulante desde hace mucho tiempo. Milagro desea invertir en material más resistente para la cubierta del techo ya que es de madera y desea cambiarlo por polines para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de los polines para hacer el cambio del techo lo antes posible.
texts.en:
Milagro, age 35, lives in her own house with her family.  Milagro earns a living by selling a variety of vegetables in an itinerant manner.  She has been doing this for a long time.

Milagro wishes to invest in more resilient material for the covering of her roof.  It is now wood, and she wishes to change it for purlins.  That is why she is requesting this loan from FUSAI.  She will use the loan to buy the purlins in order to make the change as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy the purlins to change the covering of the roof of her house.

loans.name: Rodolfo Antonio

texts.es: Rodolfo de 52 años de edad y su esposa viven desde hace diez años en casa propia. Rodolfo conduce un taxi y es así como se gana la vida. Él tiene la necesidad de cambiar la lámina del techo de su vivienda ya que está muy deteriorado también necesita construir un muro pequeño de ladrillo de barro en el corredor de su vivienda. Por lo anterior solicitó a FUSAI un crédito para comprar toda la lámina galvanizada, ladrillo de obra para el muro, hierro, cemento, arena y grava. Rodolfo conciente de su compromiso con FUSAI manifiesta que pagará puntualmente con las cuotas que este implica.
texts.en:
Rodolfo, age 52, and his wife have lived in their own house for ten years.  Rodolfo drives a taxi, and that is how he earns a living.

He needs to change the corrugated metal sheeting on his roof because it is damaged.  He also needs to build a small brick wall in the hallway of his house.  That is why he requested a loan from FUSAI to buy galvanized metal sheeting, bricks for the wall, rebar, cement, sand, and gravel.  Rodolfo, aware of his obligation to FUSAI, says that he will make his payments punctually.

loans.use: to buy galvanized metal sheeting, bricks for the wall, rebar, cement, sand, and gravel.

loans.name: Tomas Roberto

texts.es: Tomas de 53 años de edad y su compañera de vida tienen una hija menor de edad. Él trabaja de motorista y con su compañera atienden un pequeño negocio de cría y venta de pollos. Tomas desea mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda y dar mayor seguridad a su familia, él ha solicitado un crédito a FUSAI para reparar el techo y comprar lámina de acero recubierta de aluminio y zinc para cubrir una superficie de 80 metros cuadrado; además encementar el piso del corredor y la cocina. Tomas tiene un buen récord crediticio con otras instituciones.
texts.en:
Tomas, age 53, and his life partner have a minor daughter.  He works as a driver.  He and his life partner have a small business of raising and selling chickens.

Tomas wishes to improve the conditions of his house and to make his family safer.  He has requested a loan from FUSAI in order to repair the roof and to buy corrugated metal sheeting covered with aluminum and zinc in order to cover the surface of 80 square meters.  He also wants to pour concrete flooring in the hall and the kitchen.  Tomas has a good credit record with other institutions.

loans.use: to buy corrugated metal sheeting, cement, sand, and gravel, and to pour concrete on the floors in the hall and the kitchen of his house.

loans.name: Gilma Edith

texts.es: Gilma de 19 años de edad está acompañada y tiene una hija de 1 año de edad, Gilma y su compañero de vida viven en casa propia y están esforzándose para sacar adelante a su pequeña hija. Gilma está dentro del negocio de su familia quienes se dedican a comprar y vender carne de cerdos; con lo que ella gana y lo que su compañero de vida aporta, están deseosos de mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda pero no tienen el capital completo para ello. Gilma al conocer de los servicios que FUSAI tiene, les solicitó un crédito e invertir ese dinero en la reparación del techo de su vivienda (32 metros cuadrados) y encementar el piso de una habitación de aproximadamente 12 metros cuadrado. Gilma consiente del compromiso que esto implica solventará puntualmente con las cuotas de este crédito.
texts.en:
Gilma, age 19, is in a relationship and has a one year old daughter.  Gilma and her life partner live in their own house.  They are putting forth great effort to get their little daughter ahead.  Gilma works in the family business of buying and selling pork.  

With what she earns and with what her life partner contributes, they wish to improve the conditions of their house.  However, they do not have all of the money to do so.  Upon learning about the services that FUSAI offers, she requested a loan to repair the roof of her house (32 square meters) and to pour a concrete floor in a room that is approximately 12 square meters.  Gilma is aware of the obligation of the loan and will make her payments punctually.

loans.use: to buy galvanized metal sheeting, nails, wood, cement, sand, and gravel to repair the roof and to pour a cement floor in a room of her house.

loans.name: Milagro Elizabeth

texts.es: Milagro de 26 años de edad vive con su esposo y sus pequeños dos hijos (un niño de 6 años y una niña de 1 año de edad). Milagros se dedica a la venta de calzado por catalogo, su esposo es propietario de un pequeño taller de enderezado y pintado de vehículos. Milagro desea construir un dormitorio para sus hijos actualmente todos comparten una sola habitación. Por esa razón Milagro ha solicitado un crédito a FUSAI para comprar madera, hierro, cemento y lámina galvanizada que utilizará para construir la habitación de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Milagro is 26 years old and lives with her husband and two small children (a six-year-old boy and a one-year-old girl). Milagro works selling footwear by catalog. Her husband owns a small garage where he does body work and paints vehicles.

Milagro would like to build a bedroom for her children, as currently she, her husband and her children all share one room. For this reason, Milagro has requested a loan from FUSAI to buy wood, iron, cement and galvanized sheeting to build her children their own bedroom.

loans.use: to buy wood, iron, cement and galvanized sheeting to build her children their own bedroom.

loans.name: Francisco Salomon

texts.es: Francisco se 71 años de edad vive desde hace 20 años en casa propia y tiene 30 años de dedicarse a la venta de verduras en un puesto del mercado de su localidad. Francisco tiene la necesidad de reparar el techo de su casa por lo que solicitó a FUSAI un crédito para comprar la lámina galvanizada, clavos y madera para la estructura además sustituirá la teja que está quebrada. Espera que para las próximas semana pueda iniciar con los trabajos y se compromete a solventar puntualmente el pago de las cuotas.
texts.en:
Francisco is 71 years old and has lived in his own home for 20 years. He has worked for 30 years selling vegetables in a stall in the market of his town.

Francisco needs to repair the roof of his house, which is why he is requesting a loan from FUSAI to buy galvanized sheeting, nails and wood for the structure. He will also replace the clay tile, which is broken. He hopes to start this work in the coming weeks. He promises to punctually make his payments.

loans.use: to buy galvanized sheeting, nails, wood and clay tiles to repair the roof of his house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy an entrance door, iron, cement, sand and gravel to close in the entranceway to her home.

loans.name: Lidia Cristina

texts.es: Lidia de 43 años de edad reside junto a su compañero de vida quien se dedica a la agricultura y le colabora con la economía del hogar. Lidia es una mujer trabajadora quien se dedica a la crianza de patos y a la confección de prendas de vestir. De esta forma se gana la vida y junto a su compañero de vida mantienen la economía del hogar. Lidia desea terminar un cuarto dormitorio el cual no ha podido terminar por falta de recursos económicos por lo que se se acercó  a FUSAI para solicitar este crédito y así poder comprar hierro, cemento, arena, grava, ladrillo, para terminar el cuarto.
texts.en:
Lidia is 43 years old and lives with her partner, who works in agriculture. They work together meeting their household expenses. Lidia is hardworking and works raising ducks and making clothing. With these businesses she earns a living, and together with her partner they manage their household finances.

Lidia would like to finish the construction of a bedroom that she has not been able to finish because of a lack of financial resources. She went to FUSAI to request this loan to buy iron, cement, sand, gravel and brick to finish the bedroom.

loans.use: to buy iron, cement, sand, gravel and brick to finish the construction of a bedroom.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy galvanized sheeting and wooden beams to finish the construction of the roof of his kitchen.

loans.name: Maria Argelia

texts.es: María de 63 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposa desde hace mucho tiempo. María se dedica a la venta quesadillas y queso fresco desde hace dos años. De esta forma se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. María desea mejorar la galera la cual le sirve para ordeñar las vacas y así poder sacar la leche y hacer el rico queso para la venta. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, lámina galvanizada, cemento, arena, etc. Expresa tener la capacidad de pago que el crédito implica.
texts.en:
Maria is 63 years old and has for a long time now lived in her own home with her husband. Maria has worked for two years selling quesadillas and fresh cheese. With this business she earns a living and meets her household expenses.

Maria would like to improve the shed in which she milks her cows to make the delicious cheese she sells. For this reason, she is requesting this loan from FUSAI to buy bricks, galvanized sheeting, cement and sand. She says that she has the capacity to pay that the loan requires.

loans.use: to buy bricks, galvanized sheeting, cement and sand to improve the shed in which she milks her cows.

loans.name: Juan Jose

texts.es: Juan tiene 52 años de edad, vive con su esposa en casa propia. Juan es un pequeño comerciante que elabora artesanalmente manteles de tela con diferentes diseños y variedad de colores. La esposa de Juan hace todos los días tortillas las cuales vende a sus vecinos. Juan ha solicitado un crédito a FUSAI para comprar cemento, arena, grava, hierro, bloques de concreto para construir un dormitorio. Juan está dispuesto a cancelar todas las cuotas que este crédito implica.
texts.en:
Juan is 52 years old and lives with his wife in their own home. Juan has a small business making artisanal tablecloths out of fabric with different designs and a variety of colors. Juan’s wife makes tortillas every day that she sells to neighbors.

Juan has requested a loan from FUSAI to buy cement, sand, gravel, iron and concrete blocks to build a bedroom. Juan says that he is prepared to make all the payments that the loan requires.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, gravel, iron and concrete blocks to build a bedroom.

loans.name: Roxana Maricela

texts.es: Roxana de 34 años de edad es madre soltera tiene dos hijo de 14 años de edad y uno de 1 año de edad. Roxana es una pequeña comerciante de ropa de primera calidad para hombres y mujeres. A diario desde hace 5 años tiene que recorrer largas distancias para poder vender su mercadería. Roxana desea dar mejores condiciones de vida a sus dos hijos. Actualmente su vivienda está mal distribuida, la cocina de leña se encuentra a la par del dormitorio de sus hijos y el humo de la cocina se introduce directamente al dormitorio, lo que le ha generado problemas respiratorios a sus dos hijos. Roxana a solicitado un crédito a FUSAI para re ubicar la cocina y separar el dormitorio de esta; así que contratará la mano de obra y comprará la lámina y madera necesaria para hacer esta re ubicación de espacios, evitando que el humo de la cocina siga afectando la salud de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Roxana is 34 years old and a single mother of two children, ages 14 and 1. Roxana has a small business selling high-quality clothing for men and women. Everyday for five years now she has traveled long distances to sell her merchandise.

Roxana would like to improve her children’s living conditions. Currently her house is laid out poorly, with the wood-fire kitchen not separated from her children’s bedroom. The smoke from the kitchen goes directly into their bedroom, which has caused respiratory problems for both children. Roxana is requesting a loan from FUSAI to relocate her kitchen away from her children’s bedroom. She will use the loan to buy galvanized sheeting, nails and wood and to pay for the labor to relocate her kitchen so that the smoke no longer affects her children’s health.

loans.use: to buy galvanized sheeting, nails and wood and to pay for the labor to relocate her kitchen away from her children’s bedroom.

loans.name: Maria Deonila

texts.es: Doña Maria de 49 años de edad es una persona muy trabajadora, quien se dedica de lleno a su negocio, y de esta manera brindarle una vida mejor a su familia. María vive junto a su esposo y sus 3 hijos en casa propia. Ella posee una venta de frutas y verduras, la cual esta ubicada en el mercado que esta cerca de su lugar de residencia desde hace varios años, su esposo le ayuda con el negocio. María solicita un préstamo para poder comprar papas, cebollas, ejotes, sandias, piñas, guineos, etc. ya que de esta manera ella podrá obtener mejores ganancias y asi podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Maria is 49 years old and is a very hardworking woman.  She dedicates herself fully to her business so she can provide her family with a better quality of life.  Maria lives with her husband and three children in a home of her own and she sells fruits and vegetables in the market near her home, and has done this for several years.  Her husband helps her with the business.  Maria is asking for a loan to buy potatoes, onions, green beans, watermelons, pineapples, bananas, etc., so she can increase her earnings and provide a better quality of life for her family.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: el cliente vive en casa propia con su familia, el posee una tienda en su lugar de residencia tiene muchos años con su negocio y eso le ha regalado experiencia en las ventas que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias,es muy reconocido por los vecinos de la zona , se ha hecho de mucha clientela, pues tiene la tienda surtida, el quiere acrecentar el negocio y realizar una nueva inversión pero necesita de capital por eso solicita un crédito que le permita comprar lo necesario para su tienda como golosinas, granos basicos, aceite, arroz, azucar, refrescos, etc. asegura que cancelara la deuda y a la vez confía en que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida
texts.en: The borrower lives with his family in his own home, in which he has a store. This business has given him many years of experience in sales, which has allowed him to obtain the best profits. He is very well known among his neighbors, many of whom he has made customers. His store is well stocked, but he would like to grow his business with a new investment, but he needs capital. For this reason he is requesting a loan to buy items such as candy, basic grains, oil, rice, sugar, soft drinks and other items. He promises to repay the loan, which he believes will give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy items such as candy, basic grains, oil, rice, sugar, soft drinks and other items for his store.

loans.name: Maria Nicolasa

texts.es: Maria de 47 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus dos hijos, ella se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras, fresas, plátanos, naranjas, tomates, cebollas, chiles entre otros tiene 6 años con el negocio y eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia en las ventas que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, el lugar donde comercia es muy estratégico para la actividad y además muy concurrido de personas, ya tiene mucha clientela que la prefiere porque su producto es fresco, a buen precio, de calidad y con un excelente servicio; en las últimas semanas aumento la demanda y quiere aprovechar para realizar una nueva inversión pero no posee de suficiente capital que la respalde por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar frutas y verduras por mayor. Ella esta agradecida con el apoyo y asegura que podrá saldar la deuda, a la vez confía que le dará a su familia una vida mejor.
texts.en:
Maria is 47 years old and lives in her own home with her two children. She works selling fruits and vegetables, such as strawberries, bananas, oranges, tomatoes, onions and peppers. She has had this business for six years, which has given her a lot of experience in sales and has enabled her to obtain the best profits. Her selling location is strategically located and frequented by many people. She has earned many customers, who prefer her because her products are fresh, high-quality and are offered at good prices and with excellent service.

In recent weeks, demand has increased and Maria would like to take advantage of this opportunity to make a new investment in her business, but she does not have enough capital. For this reason, she is requesting a loan from Apoyo Integral to buy fruits and vegetables at wholesale prices. Maria is grateful for the support and promises to repay the loan, which she believes will give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables at wholesale prices.

loans.name: Maria Olinda

texts.es: Maria de 47 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus dos hijos, ella se dedica a la venta de tortillas en su casa desde hace varios años trabaja de lunes a domingo, tiene mucha clientela pues es una persona muy trabajadora y amable, con las ganancias que obtiene y la ayuda de su esposo logran solventar los gastos de us hogar. Doña Maria solicita un credito para comprar maiz por quintales para seguir elaborando las tortillas y asi obtener mejores ganancias para tener una mejor estabilidad economica con su familia.
texts.en: Maria is 47 years old and lives in a home of her own with her husband and two children.  She has been selling tortillas from her home for a number of years, works seven days a week and has many customers because she is a hardworking and friendly person.  She helps her husband pay the household expenses with her earnings.  Maria is asking for this loan to buy quintals of dried corn so she can continue making tortillas and have greater earnings to improve her family’s financial stability.

loans.use: to buy corn.

loans.name: Noemy Haydee

texts.es: Noemy de 41 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus tres hijos, ella se dedica a la elaboración y venta de artesanías hechas de barro desde hace 25 años, posee clientela ya establecida que la prefieren porque su trabajo es de excelente calidad y a buen precio, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Noemy esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de moldes de varios tamaños, barro, pintura y las herramientas necesarias para seguir con su trabajo ya que esa es su única fuente ingresos y así poderle dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Noemy is 41 years old and lives in a home of her own with her husband and three children.  She has been making and selling clay arts and crafts for 25 years and has an established clientele who prefer to buy from her because of the excellent quality and good prices of her items.  She pays some of the household expenses with what she earns from her work.  Noemy is asking for a loan to buy molds of various sizes, clay, paint, and the tools she needs to continue with her work which is her only source of income.  This will allow her to provide her family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy tools and supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La clienta de 19 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus dos hermanos y su madre, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa y zapatos desde hace 1 año, comercializa de forma ambulante por los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su lugar de residencia, posee mucha clientela por que vende a buen precio y sus productos sonde muy buena calidad, la clienta solicita un préstamo para poder comprar más mercadería por mayor y seguir con su negocio que es su única fuente de trabajo y así poder seguir ayudando en su casa en los gastos que se les presentan y tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: She is 19 years old and lives in a home of her own with her two siblings and her mother.  She has been selling clothing and shoes on foot for a year and sells in the various markets near her home.  She has many customers because she sells her products for good prices and they are of very good quality.  She is asking for a loan to be able to buy more merchandise in quantity and continue with her business, which is her only source of income, so she can continue to help her family with the expenses that present themselves and improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy clothing and shoes.

loans.name: Elsy Alicia

texts.es: Doña elsy de 62 años de edad vive en casa propia con su hijo quien trabaja como albañil, ella se dedica  a la agricultura su principal siembra es el maíz y frijol también siembra hortalizas, adicional a eso también vende atol de chuco (atol hecho de maíz) los fines de semana, con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella quiere hacer una mejora en su casa encementando y colocando el techo, pero con lo que gana no le alcanza apara poder realizarlo por esa razon doña Elsy solicita un crédito que le permita comprar cemento, arena, laminas, y pago de mano de obra para poder vivir junto a su hijo mas seguros.
texts.en: Elsy is 62 years old and lives in her own home with her son who works as a mason.  She is a farmer and her principle crops are corn, and beans.  She also grows vegetables and also sells “atol de chuco” (a hot drink made from corn) on the weekends.  She uses the money she earns to pay some of her household expenses.  She wants to make some home improvements by adding cement and putting up a roof, but she does not earn enough money to do it, so Elsy is asking for a loan that will allow her to buy cement, sand, metal sheeting, and pay for labor so she and her children can live safer.

loans.use: to buy building materials.

loans.name: Delfina

texts.es: Delfia de 36 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus cuatro hijos y su esposo que trabaja como empleado,  ella  trabaja como costurera, ella se encarga de confeccionar ropa formal, uniformes y ropa casual, ella es alguien muy detallista quien desarrolla un trabajo muy bueno, lo que le permite contar con la fidelidad de muchos clientes amigos y vecinos. Delfia elabora trabajos por encargo y así mismo elabora prendas de vestir para vender en su casa de habitación, donde también se dedica a elaborar su trabajo con lo que puede obtener ganancias extras. Delfia solicita un préstamo con el fin de poder comprar telas en diferentes colores y estampados, así mismo comprar hilo, agujas y todo lo necesario para elaborar la ropa con lo que pueda realizar más trabajos y asi obtener mejores ganancias y poderle dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Delfia is 36 years old and lives in a home of her own with her four children and her husband, who works as an employee.  She works as a seamstress and makes formal clothing, uniforms, and casual clothing.  She is very detail oriented and develops her work very well, which allows her to count the loyalty of many customers, friends, and neighbors.  Delfia does work on order and also makes clothing to sell out of her home, where she also earns extra money.  Delfia is asking for a loan to buy fabric of different colors and patterns, as well as thread, needles, and everything needed to make the clothing so she can do more jobs and obtain more earnings so she can provide her family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El cliente de 22 años de edad vive con su abuela en casa propia, él tiene un puesto de comida en su lugar de residencia desde hace 2 años con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar los gastos de su hogar. posee clientela fija ya que está ubicado en un lugar muy transitado. El cliente desea ampliar su puesto es decir comprar mesas, sillas, mas materia prima arroz, pollos, carne, frijoles, fruta, verduras, etc. para variar su menú, pero no cuenta con los suficientes ingresos para esta inversión, por eso solicita un crédito para poder comprar lo dicho y asi obtener mejores ganancias para tener una mejor estabilidad económica con su abuela.
texts.en:
The client is 22 years old and lives with his grandmother in their own home. He has had a food stand in his home for two years, and with the earnings he gets from his sales he manages to cover his household expenses. He has a steady clientele as he is located in a very busy location. 

The client wishes to expand his stand, that is to say buy tables, chairs, and more ingredients such as rice, chicken, meat, beans, fruit, vegetables, etc., in order to vary his menu. But he doesn't have sufficient income for this investment and that is why he is requesting a loan so that he can buy the above items and obtain better earnings so that he and his grandmother can have better financial stability.

loans.use: To buy tables and chairs, as well as rice, chicken, meat, beans, fruit, vegetables, etc.

loans.name: Henri

texts.es: Henri de 38 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus tres hijos y su esposa, el se dedica a la reparación y venta de escapes y radiadores desde hace varios años, posee clientela por su buen trabajo con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Henri esta solicitando un credito para la compra de herramientas y materiales que utiliza para su trabajo como: piezas, estaño, alambre, laminas, electrodos, etc. para poder seguir con su trabajo ya que esa es su unica fuente de ingresos y asi poderle dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Henri is 38 years old and lives in his own home with his wife and three children. He has been repairing and selling exhaust pipes and radiators for several years. 

He has a clientele because he does good work. With what he gets from his work he manages to pay for some of his household expenses. 

Henri is requesting a loan in order to buy tools and materials that he uses for his work, such as: parts, solder, wire, sheet metal, electrodes, etc. This is so that he can continue with his work, as that is his only source of income, and give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy parts, solder, wire, sheet metal, electrodes, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: la clienta de 25 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus dos hijas y su compañero de vida, ella se dedica a la compra y venta de chatarra, plástico y papel su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia desde hace varios años, con lo obtiene de su trabajo y con la ayuda de su compañero de vida logran salir adelante con su familia, La clienta esta solicitado un credito para poder comprar chatarra, plástico y papel por mayor y asi pode seguir con su trabajo que le genera buenas ganancias para darle a su familia lo que necesitan sin limitación alguna.
texts.en:
The client is 25 years old and lives in her own home with her two daughters and her life partner. She buys and sells recyclables, plastic and paper. She has had her business in her home for several years. With what she gets from her work and with the help of her life partner, they manage to support their family. 

The client is requesting a loan so that she can buy recyclable metals, plastic and paper at wholesale. This will enabling her to continue with her work, which generates good earnings, so that she can give her family what they need without any limitations.

loans.use: To buy recyclable metals, plastic and paper at wholesale

loans.name: Dalia Yanira

texts.es: Dalia de 36 años de edad es madre soltera vive en casa propia con sus dos hijos,ella posee una tienda donde vende artículos de primera necesidad, frijoles, leche, huevos, pan, entre otros, tiene muchos años con su negocio y eso le ha regalado experiencia en las ventas que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, esta ubicada en el lugar de su residencia en una localidad muy transitada, es muy reconocida por los vecinos de la zona , se ha hecho de mucha clientela, pues tiene la tienda surtida, ella quiere acrecentar el negocio y realizar una nueva inversión pero necesita de capital por eso solicita un crédito a INTEGRAL que le permita comprar lo necesario para su tienda, asegura que cancelara la deuda y a la vez confía en que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida
texts.en:
Dalia is 36 years old, a single mother, and lives in her own home with her two children. She has a store where she sells basic household necessities such as beans, milk, eggs, bread and other items. She has many years with her business and that has given her experience in sales which allows her to obtain the best earnings. It is located in her home, in a very busy location, and is very well-known by people who live in the area. 

She has attracted a large clientele, as she has the store well stocked. She wants to expand her business and undertake a new investment, but needs working capital. That is why she is requesting loan from Integral which will allow her to buy what she needs for her store. She says she will pay off the debt and at the same time has confidence that she will provide her family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy basic staples, cooking oil, sugar, candy, etc.

loans.name: Deysi Iduvina

texts.es: Deysi de 61 años de edad vive en casa propia con su nuera esposa del hijo que vive en estados unidos, ella se dedica a la elaboración y venta de quesadillas desde hace 35 años, posee clientela ya establecida que la prefieren por que las quesadillas las vende a un buen precio y son de muy buena calidad con lo que obtiene de su trabajo y con la ayuda que recibe de su hijo logar salir adelante con los gastos de su hogar, ella quiere mejorar su vivienda construyendo un muro en la parte de atrás de su vivienda, ponerle la puerta al baño y mejorar el horno donde cocina que es el que muestra la fotografía, por esa razón solicita un crédito para comprar los materiales necesarios como: arena, cemento, ladrillos, pago de mano de obra, barro, lamina, pintura, etc. y asi poder vivir junto con su nuera mas cómodas y seguras.
texts.en:
Deysi is 61 years old and lives in her own home with her daughter-in-law, the wife of her son who lives in United States. She has been making and selling quesadillas (tortillas stuffed with cheese) for 35 years. She has an already established clientele who prefer her because she sells the quesadillas at a good price, and they are of very good quality. 

With what she gets from her work and with the help she receives from her son, she is managing to cover her household expenses. She wants to improve her home by building a wall in the back of her property, by installing a door on the bathroom and improving the oven where she cooks, which is the one shown in the photograph. 

For that reason she is requesting a loan to buy the necessary materials, such as sand, cement, bricks, clay, sheet metal roofing, paint, and pay for labor.  This will enable her and her daughter-in-law to live more comfortably and securely.

loans.use: To buy sand, cement, bricks, clay, sheet metal roofing, paint, and pay for labor.

loans.name: Oscar Armando

texts.es: Oscar de 39 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañera de vida y sus dos hijos, el es una persona muy trabajadora y responsable. Oscar se dedica a la pesca artesanal, contando con una lancha y algunas redes para obtener mariscos. Él se ha dedicado prácticamente toda su vida a esta actividad, la cual incluso ahora le permite salir adelante. El solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda contar con el dinero necesario para invertir en la compra de más redes para pescar, también anzuelos y otros instrumentos necesarios para realizar la pesca diariamente. Oscar desea darles una mejor vida a sus hijos en donde puedan contar con todo lo necesario.
texts.en:
Oscar is 39 years old and lives in his own home with his life partner and their two children. He is a very hard-working and responsible person. Oscar is a small-scale fishermen, having a small boat and some nets to catch shellfish. He has devoted practically his entire life to this activity, which even today allows him to keep going. 

He is requesting a loan from Integral by means of which he will be able to have the money necessary to buy more fishing nets, as well as hooks and other tools he needs to carry out his fishing every day. Oscar wishes to give a better life to his children, where they can have everything they need.

loans.use: To buy fishing nets, hooks and other tools.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: la clienta vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, ella tiene un negocio de venta de tortas y hamburguesas desde hace un años tiene muy buena clientela pues vende su comida a un buen precio su negocio lo tiene ubicado cerca de su lugar de su residencia, con las ganancias que obtiene ayuda en los gastos que hay su casa, la clienta solicita un crédito que le permita poder comprar todo lo necesario para elaborar sus tortas y hamburguesas como: pan, tomates, cebollas, mayonesa, mortadelas, entre otros ingredientes y así poder tener mejores ganancias y seguir ayudando en su casa con los gastos que se le puedan presentar.
texts.en:
The client lives in her own home with her family. She has had a business selling sandwiches and hamburgers for a year, and has a very good clientele, as she sells her food at good prices. Her business is located near her home, and with the earnings she gets she helps with the household expenses. 

The client is requesting a loan that will allow her to buy everything she needs for making her sandwiches and hamburgers, such as: bread, tomatoes, onions, mayonnaise, cold cuts, and other ingredients. This will enable her to have better earnings and continue helping with household expenses that may arise.

loans.use: To buy bread, tomatoes, onions, mayonnaise, cold cuts, and other ingredients.

loans.name: Ángela

texts.es: ángela de 46 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo y dos hijos, ella se dedica a la elaboración de prendas de vestir, su taller está ubicado en su lugar de residencia, debido a que el años escolar está por iniciar, esta es la temporada en que se elaboran muchos uniformes, es por esto que solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, con el fin de poder contar con el dinero necesario para invertir en la compra de hilos de colores, botones, telas, y otros más, para poder tener todo lo necesario para seguir con su trabajo. Angela desea mejorar sus ganancias y de este modo darle a su familia lo que necesita sin limitación alguna.
texts.en:
Angela is 46 years old and lives with her husband and two children. She makes articles of clothing and her workshop is located in her home. Due to the fact that the school year is about to begin, this is the season when many uniforms are made. 

This is why she is requesting a loan from Integral, with the aim of being able to have the necessary money to buy colored thread, buttons, fabric and other materials so that she can have everything she needs to continue with her work. Angela wishes to improve her earnings, and in this way give her family what they need without any limitations.

loans.use: To buy colored thread, buttons, fabric, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: la clienta de 22 años de edad se dedica desde hace 3 años la venta y crianza de pollos de engorde, su granja la tiene ubicada en su lugar de residencia, posee mucha clientela por los buenos precios, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo y con la ayuda de su esposo logran solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Vive ene casa propia con su hijo y su esposo, La clienta esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de vitaminas y concentrado para los pollos y asi seguir con su trabajo que le genera buenas ganancias y poderle dar a su familia lo que necesitan sin limitación alguna.
texts.en:
The client is 22 years old and has been raising and selling chickens for three years. Her chicken coop is located at her home and she has a considerable clientele because of her good prices. With what she gets from her work and with her husband's help, she manages to cover some of her household expenses. She lives in her own home with her son and her husband. 

The client is requesting a loan for the purchase of vitamins and feed concentrate for the chickens, in order to continue with her work, which generates good earnings. This way she will be able to give her family what they need without any limitations.

loans.use: To buy vitamins and feed concentrate for her chickens.

loans.name: Juan Bautista

texts.es: Juan de 39 años de edad vive en casa propia con su familia, el posee una tienda donde vende artículos de primera necesidad, frijoles, leche, huevos, pan, entre otros, tiene 6 años con su negocio y eso le ha regalado experiencia en las ventas que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, está ubicada en el lugar de su residencia en una localidad muy transitada, se ha hecho de mucha clientela, pues tiene la tienda mas surtida, las personas lo prefieren y lo mantienen delante de la competencia porque siempre tiene lo que necesitan con producto de calidad, a precios accesibles y con un servicio inigualable siempre a la orden de los clientes, como todo buen comerciante  quiere acrecentar el negocio y realizar una nueva inversión pero necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar granos básicos, golosinas, huevos, pan, bebidas, etc. para poderle dar asu familia una mejor vida.
texts.en:
Juan is 39 years old and lives in his own home with his family. He has a store where he sells basic household necessities such as beans, milk, eggs, bread and other items. He has six years with his business, and that has given him experience in sales, allowing him to obtain the best earnings. The store is located in his home, which is in a very busy area. He has attracted a considerable clientele, as he has the store well-stocked. 

People prefer his store and keep it ahead of the competition, because he always has what they need, with quality products at affordable prices and with unmatched service–always at the disposal of his customers. 

As every good businessman does, he wishes to expand the business and undertake a new investment; but he needs capital. That is why he is applying to Integral for a loan which will allow him to buy basic staples, candy, eggs, bread, drinks, etc., so that he can give his family a better life.

loans.use: To buy beans, milk, eggs, bread, drinks, etc.

loans.name: Guillermo

texts.es: Guillermo de 56 años de edad es un hombre muy responsable con sus obligaciones de hogar, ya que siempre se ha caracterizado por brindarles lo mejor a sus hijos. Actualmente vive junto a su esposa y su hija, es muy trabajador, siempre lo ha realizado con alegría y entusiasmo, se dedica a ser agricultora siembra todos los años los principales granos básicos de la zona como lo son, maíz y frijol. Guillermo desea incrementar sus ventas y por eso visitó las oficinas de INTEGRAL para solicitar un crédito el cual le permita comprar: semillas, abonos, fertilizantes, pesticidas entre otros. Desea contar con la ayuda solicitada puesto que no tiene otros ingresos monetarios, y así el seguirá llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar sin limitación alguna.
texts.en: Guillermo is 56 years old. He is a man who is very responsible with his household obligations. He has always been described as offering his children the best. Right now, he lives with his wife and his daughter. He is very hardworking and has always worked with cheerfulness and enthusiasm. He works as a farmer, every year planting basic grains to the area such as corn and beans. Guillermo wants to increase his sales and that is why he visited the offices INTEGRAL to ask for a loan which will allow him to buy: seeds, fertilizer, pesticides and more. He wants to have the help he has asked for because he doesn't have any other income and this way, he can keep bringing the daily bread home without any limitations.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, pesticides, and more.

loans.name: Jaime Antonio

texts.es: Jaime de 40 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y su hijas, el posee una tienda en su lugar de residencia tiene 24 años con su negocio y eso le ha regalado experiencia en las ventas que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, es muy reconocido por los vecinos de la zona , se ha hecho de mucha clientela, pues tiene la tienda surtida, el quiere acrecentar el negocio y realizar una nueva inversión pero necesita de capital por eso solicita un crédito que le permita comprar lo necesario para su tienda como golosinas, granos basicos, aceite, arroz, azucar, refrescos, etc. asegura que cancelara la deuda y a la vez confía en que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida
texts.en: Jaime is 40 years old. He lives in his own home with his wife and his daughters. He has a store in his residence and has had his business for 24 years. This has given him experience in sales and has allowed him to obtain better profits. He is very well known by the area residents and has gained a lot of customers because his store is well stocked. He wants to expand the business and make a new investment but he needs capital.
